entry.value: Do you think the statues are recording our memories, then? ’Cause I remember that one on the beach looked at me funny. That must be my memory-friend!

entry.key: FoundSomething2_mergeWait, whoa, really? The Nomai carved out Ash Twin and built a time loop device inside? ...That is wild.
entry.value: Wait, whoa, really? The Nomai carved out Ash Twin and built a time loop device inside? ...That is wild.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_mergeNow we know what’s causing the loop, then. And... if it’s caused by a device, that must mean it had to be switched on, right? Huh...
entry.value: Now we know what’s causing the loop, then. And... if it’s caused by a device, that must mean it had to be switched on, right? Huh...

entry.key: FoundSomething2_mergeHey, what do you think would happen if you turned off the time loop? Like, there’s a part of me thinks maybe you shouldn’t, what with the sun blowing up and all.
entry.value: Hey, what do you think would happen if you turned off the time loop? Like, there’s a part of me thinks maybe you shouldn’t, what with the sun blowing up and all.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_mergeThen again, who wants to spend eternity being blown up by the sun?
entry.value: Then again, who wants to spend eternity being blown up by the sun?

entry.key: FoundSomething2_mergeWell, I’m no time loop expert. I’m just gonna sit here and ponder the intricacies of time and space. Maybe take a nap, too, if I feel like it.
entry.value: Well, I’m no time loop expert. I’m just gonna sit here and ponder the intricacies of time and space. Maybe take a nap, too, if I feel like it.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_mergeYou’re saying the statues were made so memories could be sent back in time? I guess that makes sense, considering we both have our memories of every loop we’ve gone through.
entry.value: You’re saying the statues were made so memories could be sent back in time? I guess that makes sense, considering we both have our memories of every loop we’ve gone through.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_mergeWait, then it’s just our memories being sent back in time to us, right? Then... are we really experiencing multiple time loops, or not?
entry.value: Wait, then it’s just our memories being sent back in time to us, right? Then... are we really experiencing multiple time loops, or not?

entry.key: FoundSomething3_mergeThat’s pretty deep... Like, maybe our consciousnesses have been through all these loops, but maybe our bodies haven’t, because technically the loops never happened.
entry.value: That’s pretty deep... Like, maybe our consciousnesses have been through all these loops, but maybe our bodies haven’t, because technically the loops never happened.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_mergeMeaning we’re receiving memories of things that will never happen to us. Cool, huh?
entry.value: Meaning we’re receiving memories of things that will never happen to us. Cool, huh?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_mergeWhoa, that’s the cannon breaking apart at the start of each time loop? For real?
entry.value: Whoa, that’s the cannon breaking apart at the start of each time loop? For real?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_mergeDid you figure out why?
entry.value: Did you figure out why?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_mergeToo much power.
entry.value: Too much power.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_mergeOverenthusiasm.
entry.value: Overenthusiasm.

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_merge...It’s kind of scary how much that sounds like something Slate or Feldspar would do. I’m pretty surprised the Nomai built something that actually broke!
entry.value: ...It’s kind of scary how much that sounds like something Slate or Feldspar would do. I’m pretty surprised the Nomai built something that actually broke!

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_mergeCome to think of it, though, “broke” might be the wrong word. Because it looks like the Orbital Probe Cannon is still firing successfully at the beginning of each time loop.
entry.value: Come to think of it, though, “broke” might be the wrong word. Because it looks like the Orbital Probe Cannon is still firing successfully at the beginning of each time loop.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_mergeOh yeah, the one in the woods, I remember writing that. Pretty fun, right? It works out to a good 24 poems.
entry.value: Oh yeah, the one in the woods, I remember writing that. Pretty fun, right? It works out to a good 24 poems.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_mergeWhen I’m done exploring, I want to make some more quantum art. Maybe some kind of creature sculpture that just, like, shows up while your back is turned and scares the daylights out of you.
entry.value: When I’m done exploring, I want to make some more quantum art. Maybe some kind of creature sculpture that just, like, shows up while your back is turned and scares the daylights out of you.

entry.key: RECORDING
entry.value: RECORDING

entry.key: RecordingGabbro here, checking in on the deep space satellite per ground control's request to check out a possible equipment problem. See, Hornfels? I do too work!
entry.value: Gabbro here, checking in on the deep space satellite per ground control's request to check out a possible equipment problem. See, Hornfels? I do too work!

entry.key: RecordingYou know, I wouldn’t mind being a satellite. It's peaceful out here, among the distant stars and the soft, velvety darkness… Bet it's (yawn) awfully nice for naps, too...
entry.value: You know, I wouldn’t mind being a satellite. It's peaceful out here, among the distant stars and the soft, velvety darkness… Bet it's (yawn) awfully nice for naps, too...

entry.key: Recording...
RecordingOh, right. The lens.
entry.value: Oh, right. The lens.

entry.key: RecordingAlright, little satellite, let's see what the trouble is.
entry.value: Alright, little satellite, let's see what the trouble is.

entry.key: Recording...Huh. Everything looks a-okay, ground control. No dust or scratches on the lens, and no evidence of sparking or violent explosions. Guess that rules out an equipment malfunction, after all.
entry.value: ...Huh. Everything looks a-okay, ground control. No dust or scratches on the lens, and no evidence of sparking or violent explosions. Guess that rules out an equipment malfunction, after all.

entry.key: RecordingHear that, pal? You’re in great shape. Keep up the good work out here!
entry.value: Hear that, pal? You’re in great shape. Keep up the good work out here!

entry.key: SIGN
entry.value: 告示

entry.key: SignCLOSED DUE TO FIRE DAMAGE
entry.value: 由于火灾受损暂停开放

entry.key: SignThe old radio tower, while an important landmark, is unfortunately closed thanks to the unsanctioned flight testing of an extremely powerful model rocket.
entry.value: The old radio tower, while an important landmark, is unfortunately closed thanks to the unsanctioned flight testing of an extremely powerful model rocket.

entry.key: SignWhile we hope to repair the radio tower in the future, all construction efforts are currently focused on the planned museum expansion at the Observatory.
entry.value: While we hope to repair the radio tower in the future, all construction efforts are currently focused on the planned museum expansion at the Observatory.

entry.key: SignSincerest apologies, except to Slate and Mica,\\n\\nHornfels (museum curator)
entry.value: Sincerest apologies, except to Slate and Mica,\\n\\nHornfels (museum curator)

entry.key: SignThe radio tower here on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and to this day still houses the first-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.
entry.value: The radio tower here on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and to this day still houses the first-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.

entry.key: SignThese photos were made possible by the deep space satellite’s unusual vertical orbit that carries it high above (and below) the plane of the solar system.
entry.value: These photos were made possible by the deep space satellite’s unusual vertical orbit that carries it high above (and below) the plane of the solar system.

entry.key: SignThanks to a recent upgrade, the deep space satellite is now responsible for generating the real-time solar system map used by our newest astronauts.
entry.value: Thanks to a recent upgrade, the deep space satellite is now responsible for generating the real-time solar system map used by our newest astronauts.

entry.key: SignOur new expansion was made possible by the generous contributions of esteemed museum visitors like you. Thank you very much for your support!
entry.value: Our new expansion was made possible by the generous contributions of esteemed museum visitors like you. Thank you very much for your support!

entry.key: SignFUTURE SITE OF OUR NEXT EXHIBIT!
entry.value: 新展览的预留位置！

entry.key: SignIf you’ve enjoyed your time with Outer Wilds, please consider supporting our planned museum expansion.
entry.value: 如果你喜欢Outer Wilds，恳请你资助我们计划中的博物馆扩展内容。

entry.key: SignOur quest to explore the furthest reaches of our solar system wouldn’t be possible without generous visitors like you! We thank you profusely for your support, and we hope to see you again soon.
entry.value: 若没有像你这样慷慨的参观者的支持，我们全面探索太阳系的任务就不可能实现！对于你的支持我们不尽感谢，期待在不远的将来与你再见。

entry.key: Slate
entry.value: Slate

entry.key: Scientist1AThere’s our pilot! Back from your pre-launch campout under the stars, I see.
entry.value: 这不是咱们的飞行员嘛！看来你刚从在星空下的发射前露宿中醒来。

entry.key: Scientist1ASo it’s Launch Day, eh? Seems like only yesterday you joined the space program, and suddenly here you are, leaving on your first solo voyage.
entry.value: 今天是发射日咯？感觉就像你昨天才加入太空计划，转眼间你就要进行你的第一次单独航行了。

entry.key: Scientist1AWhat do you say - ready to get this beauty off the ground? It’s all fueled up and ready to go!
entry.value: 怎么样？准备好开着这个大美人上天了吗？已经加满燃料可以随时出发了哦！

entry.key: SlateScientist1AAll systems go!
entry.value: 一切就绪！

entry.key: SlateScientist1AI’m ready if you are.
entry.value: 那你准备好了吗？

entry.key: SlateScientist1AYou’re sure you fixed the retro rockets?
entry.value: 你确定你把反推火箭修好了？

entry.key: Scientist1BHey, you ready to get this thing off the ground? Ship’s all fueled and ready to go.
entry.value: 喂，你准备好起飞了没？飞船已经加好油可以出发了。

entry.key: SlateScientist1BDid... did I just... die?
entry.value: 我...我刚才是...死了吗？

entry.key: SlateScientist1BAll systems go!
entry.value: 一切就绪！

entry.key: SlateScientist1BI’m ready if you are.
entry.value: 那你准备好了吗？

entry.key: SlateScientist1BYou’re sure you fixed the retro rockets?
entry.value: 你确定你把反推火箭修好了？

entry.key: ScientistAnswer11Whoa, bad dream or something? You still look half asleep, but that’s a negative on being deceased.
entry.value: 你是做噩梦了还是咋的？我看你半睡半醒的，但那可不太像是死人该有的样子。

entry.key: ScientistAnswer11I know it’s tradition to sleep out under the stars the night before a launch, but if you ask me it makes you all a bit jumpy.
entry.value: 我知道发射前在星空下露宿是个传统，但要我说，这把你们都弄得有些神经兮兮的。

entry.key: ScientistAnswer12Glad you’re excited, but remember, if you wreck the ship I’m not building you a new one. I’m not made of lightweight reentry grade aluminum alloys, you know.
entry.value: 感到兴奋是好事，但记住了，要是把飞船摔坏了的话我可不会在给你造一艘。我可不像再入大气用的轻型铝合金那样经得起折腾。

entry.key: ScientistAnswer13Are you kidding? Of course I’m ready - it’s finally time to test the new landing hydraulics with a pilot instead of the autoflight system!
entry.value: 开什么玩笑？我当然准备好了。终于是时候让飞行员而不是自动驾驶去测试新型的液压着陆器了！

entry.key: ScientistAnswer13...Speaking of pilots, make sure you don’t crash the ship the first time you put it down, you hear?
entry.value: ...说到飞行员，你最好别在第一次降落时就把飞船摔坏了，知道吗？

entry.key: ScientistAnswer14That was only a problem one time. And then maybe a few times after that, but hey, no reason to dwell on the past, right?
entry.value: 是出过一次问题。在那之后可能又出过几次，但是嘛，没必要老是纠结于过去，对吧？

entry.key: ScientistAnswer15Anyway, you’ll need to get the <color=orange>launch codes from Hornfels at the observatory</color> before you can lift off. Just bring those here once you’ve said your goodbyes or whatever.
entry.value: 总之，你得先从<color=orange>在天文台的Hornfels那里拿到发射密码</color>才能起飞。跟村里人打个招呼还是做完其他什么事之后就带密码回到这里来。

entry.key: Scientist2Not having second thoughts, are you?
entry.value: Not having second thoughts, are you?

entry.key: SlateScientist2Where are the launch codes again?
entry.value: Where are the launch codes again?

entry.key: SlateScientist2How’s the ship looking?
entry.value: How’s the ship looking?

entry.key: SlateScientist2How safe would you say this thing is?
entry.value: How safe would you say this thing is?

entry.key: SlateScientist2What’s my mission once I’m in space?
entry.value: What’s my mission once I’m in space?

entry.key: SlateScientist2What else should I do before liftoff?
entry.value: What else should I do before liftoff?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer24Hey, you’re the pilot - you tell me. Aren’t you pilot-types all eager to get up there and explore for yourselves?
entry.value: Hey, you’re the pilot - you tell me. Aren’t you pilot-types all eager to get up there and explore for yourselves?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer24Doesn’t matter if you go to the moon or Brittle Hollow or just the other side of Timber Hearth. It’s all the same to me. Get out there and have fun!
entry.value: Doesn’t matter if you go to the moon or Brittle Hollow or just the other side of Timber Hearth. It’s all the same to me. Get out there and have fun!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer24Just don’t hurt the ship, that’s all I ask.
entry.value: Just don’t hurt the ship, that’s all I ask.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer25If you have any goodbyes to say, better say ’em now. I think your friend Hal is in the observatory waiting to see you off.
entry.value: If you have any goodbyes to say, better say ’em now. I think your friend Hal is in the observatory waiting to see you off.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer25Oh, and Gossan says they have the zero-g chamber set up if you want a refresher on making ship repairs in space. Not saying you have to, but uh, it’d help get Gossan off my back if you did.
entry.value: Oh, and Gossan says they have the zero-g chamber set up if you want a refresher on making ship repairs in space. Not saying you have to, but uh, it’d help get Gossan off my back if you did.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer21Hornfels has the launch codes. Should be up at the observatory, like usual. I’m starting to think they live there.
entry.value: Hornfels has the launch codes. Should be up at the observatory, like usual. I’m starting to think they live there.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer22Great! Hey, you might get a kick out of this - I’ve repurposed the spare oxygen tank to be used as an extra combustion chamber!
entry.value: Great! Hey, you might get a kick out of this - I’ve repurposed the spare oxygen tank to be used as an extra combustion chamber!

entry.key: SlateScientistAnswer22What does that do?
entry.value: What does that do?

entry.key: SlateScientistAnswer22Is that... safe?
entry.value: Is that... safe?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer221Well, it’s all very conceptual, but basically, it’s like taking a regular second-stage booster and strapping a bigger rocket onto it. \\nIsn’t that great?
entry.value: Well, it’s all very conceptual, but basically, it’s like taking a regular second-stage booster and strapping a bigger rocket onto it. \\nIsn’t that great?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer222Probably!
entry.value: Probably!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer23Oh, it’s a perfect ten. Unless you’re factoring in pilot error, in which case it’s about a four.\\nNo offense.
entry.value: Oh, it’s a perfect ten. Unless you’re factoring in pilot error, in which case it’s about a four.\\nNo offense.

entry.key: Scientist3Oh, hold up, you’re going to want to get the launch codes from the observatory first.
entry.value: Oh, hold up, you’re going to want to get the launch codes from the observatory first.

entry.key: SlateScientist3I already got them from the observatory, remember?
entry.value: I already got them from the observatory, remember?

entry.key: SlateScientist3How did I get back here? Didn’t I already lift off?
entry.value: How did I get back here? Didn’t I already lift off?

entry.key: SlateScientist3Wait, did I just die, or...?
entry.value: Wait, did I just die, or...?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer31Huh. Must be inhaling more fumes than I realized. That stuff is potent.
entry.value: Huh. Must be inhaling more fumes than I realized. That stuff is potent.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer31Well, if you’ve got the codes, I’m not gonna stop you. Good luck, and take care of that ship!
entry.value: Well, if you’ve got the codes, I’m not gonna stop you. Good luck, and take care of that ship!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer32Trust me -- with the modifications I’ve made to those rockets? There’s no way I would have missed that.
entry.value: Trust me -- with the modifications I’ve made to those rockets? There’s no way I would have missed that.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer32I won’t ask how you got the launch codes, but since you have ’em, get a move on! I want to see whether the new cockpit stays attached during liftoff.
entry.value: I won’t ask how you got the launch codes, but since you have ’em, get a move on! I want to see whether the new cockpit stays attached during liftoff.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer33Uh, no...? You have a bad dream or something?
entry.value: Uh, no...? You have a bad dream or something?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer33I won’t ask how you got the codes, so hurry up and launch before Hornfels decides to ground you for medical reasons. I want to see whether the new cockpit stays attached during liftoff.
entry.value: I won’t ask how you got the codes, so hurry up and launch before Hornfels decides to ground you for medical reasons. I want to see whether the new cockpit stays attached during liftoff.

entry.key: Scientist4Looks like you’re ready for takeoff! The excitement of a launch is fun and all, but I can’t wait to get back to working on the new ship.\\nWe’re working on fixing the autopilot’s avoidance system for this one!
entry.value: 看来你准备好起飞了！观看激动人心的发射过程是很有趣，但是我得回到关于新飞船的工作中去了。\\n我们正忙着修好这一艘的自动避障系统。

entry.key: Scientist4...Uh, sorry.
Scientist5There’s our pilot! Ready to get this beauty off the ground?
entry.value: There’s our pilot! Ready to get this beauty off the ground?

entry.key: Scientist5Hey, what can I do you for?
entry.value: Hey, what can I do you for?

entry.key: SlateScientist5You know the ship is a death-trap, right?
entry.value: You know the ship is a death-trap, right?

entry.key: SlateScientist5You’re lucky I’m in a time loop, because otherwise I’d be super dead.
entry.value: You’re lucky I’m in a time loop, because otherwise I’d be super dead.

entry.key: SlateScientist5The autopilot flew my ship directly into the sun!
entry.value: The autopilot flew my ship directly into the sun!

entry.key: SlateScientist5I keep getting killed by ghost matter.
entry.value: I keep getting killed by ghost matter.

entry.key: SlateScientist5The sun is going to go supernova, by the way.
entry.value: The sun is going to go supernova, by the way.

entry.key: SlateScientist5Did you know it’s just an endless void outside our solar system?
entry.value: Did you know it’s just an endless void outside our solar system?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer35Well yeah, it’s a death-trap, but a really powerful death trap. What, you suddenly care about safety now?
entry.value: Well yeah, it’s a death-trap, but a really powerful death trap. What, you suddenly care about safety now?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer36And you’re lucky I don’t have you grounded for medical reasons, because I have no idea what you’re talking about.
entry.value: And you’re lucky I don’t have you grounded for medical reasons, because I have no idea what you’re talking about.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer37Had an exciting dream, did you?
entry.value: Had an exciting dream, did you?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer37It’s not exactly impossible for the autopilot to get you too close to the sun, but it’s not like it’ll try to take you there on purpose.
entry.value: It’s not exactly impossible for the autopilot to get you too close to the sun, but it’s not like it’ll try to take you there on purpose.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer37Make sure the sun isn’t between you and your destination when you engage autopilot, and you’ll be fine.
entry.value: Make sure the sun isn’t between you and your destination when you engage autopilot, and you’ll be fine.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer38Use your scout to detect it, you dumb idiot! Did you think I made that just so you could take pretty little pictures of trees? It has multiple uses!
entry.value: Not if you use your scout to detect it, you won’t, you dumb idiot! Did you think I made that just so you could take pretty little pictures of trees? It has multiple uses!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer38You do know you can use it as a light source, right? Stars above, please tell me you knew that.
entry.value: You do know you can use it as a light source, right? Stars above, please tell me you knew that.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer39Oh yeah, the observatory has an exhibit about that.
entry.value: Oh yeah, the observatory has an exhibit about that.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer39Between you and me, I glossed over some of the finer details. Astrophysics is really more Hornfels’s domain.
entry.value: Between you and me, I glossed over some of the finer details. Astrophysics is really more Hornfels’s domain.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer39Me, I’m here for the rocket science and the marshmallows.
entry.value: Me, I’m here for the rocket science and the marshmallows.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer40Yeah, I’d stick to exploring our solar system, if I were you. As much as I hate to admit it, our ships aren’t deep-space-worthy.
entry.value: Yeah, I’d stick to exploring our solar system, if I were you. As much as I hate to admit it, our ships aren’t deep-space-worthy.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_IntroHey, hold up a sec!
entry.value: Hey, hold up a sec!

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_IntroYeah yeah yeah, I already know about the launch codes.
entry.value: Yeah yeah yeah, I already know about the launch codes.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1What? No, I was going to tell you about using the ship log to set destination markers for locations you’ve visited before.
entry.value: What? No, I was going to tell you about using the ship log to set destination markers for locations you’ve visited before.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1It’s a brilliant feature, if I say so myself. Dead useful. And the risk it poses of shorting out the fuel regulator and causing the ship to explode is so minimal that only Gossan would worry about it.
entry.value: It’s a brilliant feature, if I say so myself. Dead useful. And the risk it poses of shorting out the fuel regulator and causing the ship to explode is so minimal that only Gossan would worry about it.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1Wait, so how do I use it?
entry.value: Wait, so how do I use it?

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1Use the ship log to mark a location I want to revisit. Got it.
entry.value: Use the ship log to mark a location I want to revisit. Got it.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1How minimal are we talking?
entry.value: How minimal are we talking?

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1What about locations I haven’t visited before?
entry.value: What about locations I haven’t visited before?

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1aWhen you’re on your ship, open up its log to the location you want to mark. Anywhere’s fine, as long as you’ve been there at least once.
entry.value: When you’re on your ship, open up its log to the location you want to mark. Anywhere’s fine, as long as you’ve been there at least once.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1aHop in the pilot seat, and the ship will throw up a destination marker on your display. It’s that easy.
entry.value: Hop in the pilot seat, and the ship will throw up a destination marker on your display. It’s that easy.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1bMinimal! Stars above, you worry too much. If anything’s going to kill you, it’s the autopilot.
entry.value: Minimal! Stars above, you worry too much. If anything’s going to kill you, it’s the autopilot.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1cOh, sure, I’ll just magically have the system know all the possible locations you plan to discover throughout the entire solar system, shall I?
entry.value: Oh, sure, I’ll just magically have the system know all the possible locations you plan to discover throughout the entire solar system, shall I?

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2“Wow, Slate! How do you come up with these incredible ideas?” Oh, I do the best I can with what I’ve got. Really, you’re too kind.
entry.value: “Wow, Slate! How do you come up with these incredible ideas?” Oh, I do the best I can with what I’ve got. Really, you’re too kind.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_2Slate, you are a technological marvel.
entry.value: Slate, you are a technological marvel.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_2This was extraordinarily convenient timing. Thanks!
entry.value: This was extraordinarily convenient timing. Thanks!

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_2That’s not what my voice sounds like.
entry.value: That’s not what my voice sounds like.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2a...Whoa, say that again! Please? That sounds so good when it’s not sarcastic.
entry.value: ...Whoa, say that again! Please? That sounds so good when it’s not sarcastic.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2bSure thing, hatchling!
entry.value: Sure thing, hatchling!

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2cEveryone’s a critic.
entry.value: Everyone’s a critic.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_3Anyway, I’ve got a fire to enjoy, and you’ve got launch codes to grab. Go wild with the marking feature while you're out there. Just, uh, try not to follow it so directly you fly into the sun, okay?
entry.value: Anyway, I’ve got a fire to enjoy, and you’ve got launch codes to grab. Go wild with the marking feature while you're out there. Just, uh, try not to follow it so directly you fly into the sun, okay?

entry.key: WARNING: Increased solar activity detected.
entry.value: 警告：检测到太阳活动增强。

entry.key: WARNING: Increased volcanic activity detected.
entry.value: 警告：检测到火山活动增强。

entry.key: VERDICT: Location is now inhospitable. Evacuation recommended.
entry.value: 结论：此处已不宜居住。建议撤离。

entry.key: ERROR: Unable to determine orbit. No signal detected matching any known criteria for the Eye of the universe.
entry.value: 错误：无法确定轨道。没有检测到符合宇宙之眼任何已知特征的的信号。

entry.key: Feldspar
entry.value: Feldspar

entry.key: Feldspar1Whoa!
entry.value: Whoa!

entry.key: Feldspar1Where’d you come from? No one’s come here in... well, ever, actually. That makes you the second Hearthian to ever reach Dark Bramble — after me, of course. Well done!
entry.value: Where’d you come from? No one’s come here in... well, ever, actually. That makes you the second Hearthian to ever reach Dark Bramble — after me, of course. Well done!

entry.key: Feldspar1...Say, it’s you! They made you an astronaut? And you haven’t blown yourself up yet, good for you!
entry.value: ...Say, it’s you! They made you an astronaut? And you haven’t blown yourself up yet, good for you!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1Let me guess: anglerfish?
entry.value: Let me guess: anglerfish?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1Feldspar! You’re alive!
entry.value: Feldspar! You’re alive!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1We all thought you were dead for sure.
entry.value: We all thought you were dead for sure.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1Have you been here in Dark Bramble all this time?
entry.value: Have you been here in Dark Bramble all this time?

entry.key: Feldspar2...You never were the brightest hatchling, were you.
entry.value: ...You never were the brightest hatchling, were you.

entry.key: Feldspar2Yeah, that’s right, I’m alive. Been camping out here since my ship, uh, y’know. Crashed.<Pause> Violently.
entry.value: Yeah, that’s right, I’m alive. Been camping out here since my ship, uh, y’know. Crashed.<Pause> Violently.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar2Wait, what?
entry.value: Wait, what?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar2You crashed? But you’re the greatest pilot in Hearthian history!
entry.value: You crashed? But you’re the greatest pilot in Hearthian history!

entry.key: Feldspar2aI haven’t lived in polite society for a while, so I’m just going to go ahead and assume that wasn’t sarcasm.
entry.value: I haven’t lived in polite society for a while, so I’m just going to go ahead and assume that wasn’t sarcasm.

entry.key: Feldspar3What! Me, killed off by thorny, extradimensional plants that entirely violate the laws of space and time, and a couple of giant predatory fish with gaping maws and enormously sharp fangs? Not in this lifetime, little buddy.
entry.value: What! Me, killed off by thorny, extradimensional plants that entirely violate the laws of space and time, and a couple of giant predatory fish with gaping maws and enormously sharp fangs? Not in this lifetime, little buddy.

entry.key: Feldspar3I set up camp here when my ship got stuck here in Dark Bramble. Been living off the land ever since.
entry.value: I set up camp here when my ship got stuck here in Dark Bramble. Been living off the land ever since.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar3So what exactly happened to your ship?
entry.value: So what exactly happened to your ship?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar3“Got stuck”? But aren’t you the greatest pilot in Hearthian history?
entry.value: "Got stuck"? But aren’t you the greatest pilot in Hearthian history?

entry.key: Feldspar4Depends on how long “all this time” is. I’ve been here a while, I guess. Ever since I crashed my ship into — that is, ever since my daring escape from the jaws of an anglerfish!
entry.value: Depends on how long "all this time" is. I’ve been here a while, I guess. Ever since I crashed my ship into — that is, ever since my daring escape from the jaws of an anglerfish!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar4Tell me more about your flying prowess!
entry.value: Tell me more about your flying prowess!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar4You crashed your ship, didn’t you.
entry.value: You crashed your ship, didn’t you.

entry.key: Feldspar4aHaha, you flatter me! ...I like it!
entry.value: Haha, you flatter me! ...I like it!

entry.key: Feldspar4bObviously, yes. No need to be rude.
entry.value: Obviously, yes. No need to be rude.

entry.key: Feldspar5...well, like I said, I crash. Blammo! On impact, my ship starts making noises like it’s coming apart from the inside, and I think, well, that ain’t great. Sure enough, I barely get out of there before the electrical systems start sparking like crazy.
entry.value: ...well, like I said, I crash. Blammo! On impact, my ship starts making noises like it’s coming apart from the inside, and I think, well, that ain’t great. Sure enough, I barely get out of there before the electrical systems start sparking like crazy.

entry.key: Feldspar5It’s either move fast or die unpleasantly, so I had to put a little distance between me and my poor, fried ship.
entry.value: It’s either move fast or die unpleasantly, so I had to put a little distance between me and my poor, fried ship.

entry.key: Feldspar5I camped out near where I crashed at first. I found this skeleton later — great find, would’ve been stupid not to use it.
entry.value: I camped out near where I crashed at first. I found this skeleton later — great find, would’ve been stupid not to use it.

entry.key: Feldspar5So I moved my setup over here and planted my emergency tree seeds. Been here ever since!
entry.value: So I moved my setup over here and planted my emergency tree seeds. Been here ever since!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5...Wow.
entry.value: ...Wow.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5I can’t believe you didn’t die.
entry.value: I can’t believe you didn’t die.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5I can’t believe you destroyed your ship.
entry.value: I can’t believe you destroyed your ship.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5No wonder there are so many stories about you back home!
entry.value: No wonder there are so many stories about you back home!

entry.key: Feldspar5aMy story goes like this. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep, and I wanted to try my hand at Dark Bramble, seeing as no one had ever been before.
entry.value: My story goes like this. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep, and I wanted to try my hand at Dark Bramble, seeing as no one had ever been before.

entry.key: Feldspar5aGetting around in Dark Bramble was easy, mind you. Once you’ve dodged one massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, you’ve dodged ’em all.
entry.value: Getting around in Dark Bramble was easy, mind you. Once you’ve dodged one massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, you’ve dodged ’em all.

entry.key: Feldspar5aBut after a while, I run into this huge anglerfish — you’ve seen ’em? Big gnarly things, and this was the biggest one I’ve ever seen. I pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...
entry.value: But after a while, I run into this huge anglerfish — you’ve seen ’em? Big gnarly things, and this was the biggest one I’ve ever seen. I pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...

entry.key: Feldspar5bOh, this is a good story. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep and needed a new challenge, and none of us had ever been inside Dark Bramble, so I think, hey, let’s give that a try.
entry.value: Oh, this is a good story. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep and needed a new challenge, and none of us had ever been inside Dark Bramble, so I think, hey, let’s give that a try.

entry.key: Feldspar5bI’ve been cruising around for a while, dodging the odd massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, when I run into this huge anglerfish, the biggest I’ve ever seen.
entry.value: I’ve been cruising around for a while, dodging the odd massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, when I run into this huge anglerfish, the biggest I’ve ever seen.

entry.key: Feldspar5bI pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...
entry.value: I pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...

entry.key: Feldspar5cHaha, you flatter me! ...I like it!
entry.value: Haha, you flatter me! ...I like it!

entry.key: Feldspar5cI came to Dark Bramble for the excitement. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep and needed a new challenge, and none of us had ever gone farther than Dark Bramble’s ice fields, so I thought, hey, let’s give it a try.
entry.value: I came to Dark Bramble for the excitement. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep and needed a new challenge, and none of us had ever gone farther than Dark Bramble’s ice fields, so I thought, hey, let’s give it a try.

entry.key: Feldspar5cI’ve been cruising around for a while, dodging the odd massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, when I run into this huge anglerfish, the biggest I’ve ever seen.
entry.value: I’ve been cruising around for a while, dodging the odd massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, when I run into this huge anglerfish, the biggest I’ve ever seen.

entry.key: Feldspar5cI pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...
entry.value: I pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...

entry.key: Feldspar6aYeah, pretty much.
entry.value: Yeah, pretty much.

entry.key: Feldspar6bYou know, in the old days, I used to think the same thing every time I came back from a flight in one piece.
entry.value: You know, in the old days, I used to think the same thing every time I came back from a flight in one piece.

entry.key: Feldspar6bThese days, I’m used to it.
entry.value: These days, I’m used to it.

entry.key: Feldspar6cEasy for you to say. Your ship probably has all kinds of fancy modifications and upgrades, like “working retro boosters” and “non-flammable construction materials.”
entry.value: Easy for you to say. Your ship probably has all kinds of fancy modifications and upgrades, like "working retro boosters" and "non-flammable construction materials."

entry.key: Feldspar6dHeh. You’re not half-bad yourself, making it here in one piece.
entry.value: Heh. You’re not half-bad yourself, making it here in one piece.

entry.key: Feldspar7Anyway, that’s how it all went down, hatchling!
entry.value: Anyway, that’s how it all went down, hatchling!

entry.key: Feldspar7Story’s over, but feel free to stay and enjoy the fire a while.
entry.value: Story’s over, but feel free to stay and enjoy the fire a while.

entry.key: Feldspar7Or don’t. Fire’s not going anywhere.
entry.value: Or don’t. Fire’s not going anywhere.

entry.key: FeldsparSkipHeh, you got it in one. Kind of hard not to, once you’ve seen one of those fish up close and personal-like.
entry.value: Heh, you got it in one. Kind of hard not to, once you’ve seen one of those fish up close and personal-like.

entry.key: FeldsparSkipWell, take a load off and refill your oxygen tank, hatchling! There’s plenty of fire to go around.
entry.value: Well, take a load off and refill your oxygen tank, hatchling! There’s plenty of fire to go around.

entry.key: FeldsparPrimaryMenuAnything else you wanted?
entry.value: Anything else you wanted?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuI found something!
entry.value: I found something!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuWhere should I explore here?
entry.value: Where should I explore here?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuYou reached the core of Giant’s Deep? How’d you do it?
entry.value: You reached the core of Giant’s Deep? How’d you do it?

entry.value: Where’s your ship?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuWhat happened to this anglerfish?
entry.value: What happened to this anglerfish?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuShouldn’t I tell ground control to come get you?
entry.value: Shouldn’t I tell ground control to come get you?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuNah, I’m good.
entry.value: Nah, I’m good.

entry.key: FeldsparSecondaryHey, hatchling, pull up a marshmallow stick!
entry.value: Hey, hatchling, pull up a marshmallow stick!

entry.key: FeldsparSecondaryCome to hear tales of my heroic exploits, have you?
entry.value: Come to hear tales of my heroic exploits, have you?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryI found something!
entry.value: I found something!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryWhere should I explore here?
entry.value: Where should I explore here?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryYou reached the core of Giant’s Deep? How’d you do it?
entry.value: You reached the core of Giant’s Deep? How’d you do it?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryWhere’s your ship?
entry.value: Where’s your ship?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryWhat happened to this anglerfish?
entry.value: What happened to this anglerfish?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryShouldn’t I tell ground control to come get you?
entry.value: Shouldn’t I tell ground control to come get you?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryNah, I’m good.
entry.value: Nah, I’m good.

entry.key: FeldsparFishOh, the skeleton? It was like this when I got here.
entry.value: Oh, the skeleton? It was like this when I got here.

entry.key: FeldsparFishAs near as I can tell, this anglerfish must have been chewing on the vine and eaten a seed, and then the seed grew and grew in the poor fish’s stomach until... this happened.
entry.value: As near as I can tell, this anglerfish must have been chewing on the vine and eaten a seed, and then the seed grew and grew in the poor fish’s stomach until... this happened.

entry.key: FeldsparFishGross, huh?
entry.value: Gross, huh?

entry.key: FeldsparFishThis skeleton was a good find. Keeps the fish away. See, they’re territorial, so they mostly avoid each other. That’s why I set up camp here.
entry.value: This skeleton was a good find. Keeps the fish away. See, they’re territorial, so they mostly avoid each other. That’s why I set up camp here.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreGiant’s Deep’s core, huh? Ahhh, that was a wild one.
entry.value: Giant’s Deep’s core, huh? Ahhh, that was a wild one.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreBut since you’re asking, I gotta assume you haven’t made it down there yourself yet, right? If I tell you how, it kinda feels like cheating.
entry.value: But since you’re asking, I gotta assume you haven’t made it down there yourself yet, right? If I tell you how, it kinda feels like cheating.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreHm...
entry.value: Hm...

entry.key: FeldsparCore...On a completely unrelated note, that sure was a big, hollow vine my ship crashed into. Yep.
entry.value: ...On a completely unrelated note, that sure was a big, hollow vine my ship crashed into. Yep.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreIf I were you, I’d go take a walk and see where it ends.
entry.value: If I were you, I’d go take a walk and see where it ends.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreYou’ll want to go to the tail end of this anglerfish skeleton here and look for a flickering light in the fog — that’ll be my old ship. Path starts there.
entry.value: You’ll want to go to the tail end of this anglerfish skeleton here and look for a flickering light in the fog — that’ll be my old ship. Path starts there.

entry.key: FeldsparGoodIf you change your mind, you know where to find me!
entry.value: If you change your mind, you know where to find me!

entry.key: FeldsparRescueWell... yeah, sure, whenever you have the time.
entry.value: Well... yeah, sure, whenever you have the time.

entry.key: FeldsparRescueFrankly, I kinda like it out here. Quiet, peaceful...ish.
entry.value: Frankly, I kinda like it out here. Quiet, peaceful...ish.

entry.key: FeldsparRescueYou’re a little young to understand, but it’s a lot of pressure, being the best that ever was. Been nice to have a break.
entry.value: You’re a little young to understand, but it’s a lot of pressure, being the best that ever was. Been nice to have a break.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreThat’s the spirit!
entry.value: That’s the spirit!

entry.key: FeldsparExploreAnywhere’s good, but you should know that space is weird here. Intensely.
entry.value: Anywhere’s good, but you should know that space is weird here. Intensely.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreEver tried throwing your scout into one of these weird seeds? See there, with the little opening? It’s just big enough to launch one through.
entry.value: Ever tried throwing your scout into one of these weird seeds? See there, with the little opening? It’s just big enough to launch one through.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreYour scout tracker will tell you the scout is in two places at once, but I don’t think that’s... wrong, exactly, because space doesn’t work right in here. That seed looks small, see? But inside, it’s bigger.
entry.value: Your scout tracker will tell you the scout is in two places at once, but I don’t think that’s... wrong, exactly, because space doesn’t work right in here. That seed looks small, see? But inside, it’s bigger.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreMuch bigger.
entry.value: Much bigger.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreI’ve had a lot of time to think about this, and my theory is space in Dark Bramble kind of expands as you go through each sphere. That’s why it’s bigger inside those seeds.
entry.value: I’ve had a lot of time to think about this, and my theory is space in Dark Bramble kind of expands as you go through each sphere. That’s why it’s bigger inside those seeds.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreWell, that’s my theory. Keep that in mind while you’re exploring Dark Bramble and maybe you won’t get lost inside forever.
entry.value: Well, that’s my theory. Keep that in mind while you’re exploring Dark Bramble and maybe you won’t get lost inside forever.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreGood luck!
entry.value: Good luck!

entry.key: FeldsparShipwreckNot far from here, as a matter of fact! If you go straight past the tail of this anglerfish skeleton here, you’ll see a flickering light in the fog.
entry.value: Not far from here, as a matter of fact! If you go straight past the tail of this anglerfish skeleton here, you’ll see a flickering light in the fog.

entry.key: FeldsparShipwreckFollow that, and you’ll find my old ship.<Pause> What’s left of it, anyway.
entry.value: Follow that, and you’ll find my old ship.<Pause> What’s left of it, anyway.

entry.key: FoundSomethingMenuLay it on me, hatchling!
entry.value: Lay it on me, hatchling!

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI went to the core of Giant’s Deep.
entry.value: I went to the core of Giant’s Deep.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found the frozen jellyfish near your ship.
entry.value: I found the frozen jellyfish near your ship.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found the Anglerfish nest.
entry.value: I found the Anglerfish nest.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found a Dark Bramble seed on Timber Hearth.
entry.value: I found a Dark Bramble seed on Timber Hearth.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found Nomai writing saying anglerfish are blind.
entry.value: I found Nomai writing saying anglerfish are blind.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found a Nomai shuttle and flew it!
entry.value: I found a Nomai shuttle and flew it!

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuActually, nevermind.
entry.value: Actually, nevermind.

entry.key: FoundSomething1So you figured out the ol’ tornado trick, did you? Good work!
entry.value: So you figured out the ol’ tornado trick, did you? Good work!

entry.key: FoundSomething1I found that bit out by accident, but let’s keep that between you and me, hey? Hornfels would have my very handsome head if they knew I’d been riding the cyclones again.
entry.value: I found that bit out by accident, but let’s keep that between you and me, hey? Hornfels would have my very handsome head if they knew I’d been riding the cyclones again.

entry.key: FoundSomething1“The ship is fragile! It can break! You can’t subject it to extreme conditions!” Not like I was flying the thing into the sun, now, was I?
entry.value: "The ship is fragile! It can break! You can’t subject it to extreme conditions!" Not like I was flying the thing into the sun, now, was I?

entry.key: FoundSomething1And the jellyfish, you figured those out, too? Hatchling, I tell you what, you’ve done real well for yourself! You’re a fine astronaut, sure, but you might just become a pilot yet!
entry.value: And the jellyfish, you figured those out, too? Hatchling, I tell you what, you’ve done real well for yourself! You’re a fine astronaut, sure, but you might just become a pilot yet!

entry.key: FoundSomething2Ha! So the old thing still there, is it? That’s where I first camped out after the crash, you know. It was pretty cozy inside!
entry.value: Ha! So the old thing still there, is it? That’s where I first camped out after the crash, you know. It was pretty cozy inside!

entry.key: FoundSomething2It does lack the structural integrity and indomitable spirit of a camp made in the shelter of the very bones of the species that tried to eat you, I suppose.
entry.value: It does lack the structural integrity and indomitable spirit of a camp made in the shelter of the very bones of the species that tried to eat you, I suppose.

entry.key: FoundSomething2Still. Very cozy.
entry.value: Still. Very cozy.

entry.key: FoundSomething3So that’s where the blasted things come from, is it? Stars above, if I still had a working ship, I’d be sorely tempted to go show ’em what’s what!
entry.value: So that’s where the blasted things come from, is it? Stars above, if I still had a working ship, I’d be sorely tempted to go show ’em what’s what!

entry.key: FoundSomething3<color=grey>Sigh...</color>
entry.value: <color=grey>Sigh...</color>

entry.key: FoundSomething3Probably best to leave ’em alone, though, really. More trouble than it’s worth to mess with anglerfish.
entry.value: Probably best to leave ’em alone, though, really. More trouble than it’s worth to mess with anglerfish.

entry.key: FoundSomething4...That’s bad business, hatchling.
entry.value: ...That’s bad business, hatchling.

entry.key: FoundSomething4As Chert will tell you if you so much as glance in Dark Bramble’s direction, there used to be a fifth planet where the Bramble is now.
entry.value: As Chert will tell you if you so much as glance in Dark Bramble’s direction, there used to be a fifth planet where the Bramble is now.

entry.key: FoundSomething4This infernal plant appeared at the center and kept growing, and growing, and growing, until it shattered the planet and scattered its pieces across space.
entry.value: This infernal plant appeared at the center and kept growing, and growing, and growing, until it shattered the planet and scattered its pieces across space.

entry.key: FoundSomething4If we don’t get that seed you found sorted real quicklike, I suspect Timber Hearth will be heading toward the same fate. And I tell you what, we Hearthians have overcome far too much to be done in by some worthless seed.
entry.value: If we don’t get that seed you found sorted real quicklike, I suspect Timber Hearth will be heading toward the same fate. And I tell you what, we Hearthians have overcome far too much to be done in by some worthless seed.

entry.key: FoundSomething5A-ha! So the blasted things do have a weakness!
entry.value: A-ha! So the blasted things do have a weakness!

entry.key: FoundSomething5Meaning my fly-as-fast-as-I-can approach to dealing with them could have used a bit more thought behind it.
entry.value: Meaning my fly-as-fast-as-I-can approach to dealing with them could have used a bit more thought behind it.

entry.key: FoundSomething5Ah, well, at least they didn’t eat me. All’s well that ends well, eh, hatchling?
entry.value: Ah, well, at least they didn’t eat me. All’s well that ends well, eh, hatchling?

entry.key: FoundSomething7You flew a Nomaian shuttle? You don’t say! How was it? How did it handle?
entry.value: You flew a Nomaian shuttle? You don’t say! How was it? How did it handle?

entry.key: FoundSomething7Can’t say I’d mind having a go at that myself, hatchling. Once I return to Timber Hearth, maybe that’ll have to be my next stop.
entry.value: Can’t say I’d mind having a go at that myself, hatchling. Once I return to Timber Hearth, maybe that’ll have to be my next stop.

entry.key: FoundSomething7A brand-new astronaut, and you’re already a pro adventurer! Outer Wilds Ventures is in good hands with you, I can tell. The flight program is going places!
entry.value: A brand-new astronaut, and you’re already a pro adventurer! Outer Wilds Ventures is in good hands with you, I can tell. The flight program is going places!

entry.key: FoundSomething6Nothing you want to share with me? Sounds like you’d better get out there and start exploring!
entry.value: Nothing you want to share with me? Sounds like you’d better get out there and start exploring!

entry.key: SignDespite my checking on them at least a thousand times over, the images are STILL not ready to print over in the radio tower. Well, it’s like they say — a watched satellite never transmits data! <size=20>(Haha, that’s a little joke for you, journal. No one says that.)</size>
entry.value: Despite my checking on them at least a thousand times over, the images are STILL not ready to print over in the radio tower. Well, it’s like they say — a watched satellite never transmits data! <size=20>(Haha, that’s a little joke for you, journal. No one says that.)</size>

entry.key: SignSomeday, I’ll have to study the mechanics of how time manages to slow to a syrupy crawl whenever I’m anticipating something. In the meantime, I’ve turned to Gabbro, our resident expert in leisurely whiling away the hours, who recommends the following:
entry.value: Someday, I’ll have to study the mechanics of how time manages to slow to a syrupy crawl whenever I’m anticipating something. In the meantime, I’ve turned to Gabbro, our resident expert in leisurely whiling away the hours, who recommends the following:

entry.key: SignGABBRO’S 3 FOOLPROOF STEPS FOR DOZING OFF\\n 1. Light a nice, cozy campfire and get comfortable.\\n 2. Gaze deeply into the serene warmth.\\n 3. Let time begin to slip away as you allow the flames to lull you into a peaceful slumber.
entry.value: GABBRO’S 3 FOOLPROOF STEPS FOR DOZING OFF\\n 1. Light a nice, cozy campfire and get comfortable.\\n 2. Gaze deeply into the serene warmth.\\n 3. Let time begin to slip away as you allow the flames to lull you into a peaceful slumber.

entry.key: Sign(If Gabbro knew I’d taken notes, they’d probably think I’d finally cracked, but I refuse to accept sass from an astronaut who deliberately burns their marshmallows.)
entry.value: (If Gabbro knew I’d taken notes, they’d probably think I’d finally cracked, but I refuse to accept sass from an astronaut who deliberately burns their marshmallows.)

entry.key: SignCharting stars again out by the radio tower — they’re so bright out here! I only wish I were able to record them faster. Admittedly, I could use more patience. I get so engrossed in my work that sunrise becomes an unwelcome deadline, and daylight a grating slog.
entry.value: Charting stars again out by the radio tower — they’re so bright out here! I only wish I were able to record them faster. Admittedly, I could use more patience. I get so engrossed in my work that sunrise becomes an unwelcome deadline, and daylight a grating slog.

entry.key: Sign...Aaand we’re recording! Ahem. It’s been two days since the launch of the deep space satellite, and I’m about to view the first batch of photos. Let the record show that on this historic day, Outer Wilds Ventures has—
entry.value: ...Aaand we’re recording! Ahem. It’s been two days since the launch of the deep space satellite, and I’m about to view the first batch of photos. Let the record show that on this historic day, Outer Wilds Ventures has—

entry.key: SignAaaah! They’re printing, they’re printing! Here they come!
entry.value: Aaaah! They’re printing, they’re printing! Here they come!

entry.key: Sign…Stars above, will you look at that. There’s Brittle Hollow. And look, look there, that’s Hollow’s Lantern! And there’s Giant’s Deep, and — and the Quantum Moon! I’m speechless, completely speechless.
entry.value: …Stars above, will you look at that. There’s Brittle Hollow. And look, look there, that’s Hollow’s Lantern! And there’s Giant’s Deep, and — and the Quantum Moon! I’m speechless, completely speechless.

entry.key: SignEvery single astral body in our magnificent solar system, looking stunning from every angle in each of these three images. And in color, no less! Now this is art. I could stare at these photos forever. Doesn’t Timber Hearth look tiny from —
entry.value: Every single astral body in our magnificent solar system, looking stunning from every angle in each of these three images. And in color, no less! Now this is art. I could stare at these photos forever. Doesn’t Timber Hearth look tiny from —

entry.key: SignHold on. What is that?
entry.value: Hold on. What is that?

entry.key: SignThat can’t be right. That’s… I mean, that’s not even possible. Am I interpreting this photo correctly? What’s even stranger is it doesn’t show up in either of the other photos. Just this one…
entry.value: That can’t be right. That’s… I mean, that’s not even possible. Am I interpreting this photo correctly? What’s even stranger is it doesn’t show up in either of the other photos. Just this one…

entry.key: SignWell, there must have been an equipment malfunction, I suppose. Only sensible explanation for it. I’ll radio Gabbro and ask them to go examine the satellite’s lens for defects.
entry.value: Well, there must have been an equipment malfunction, I suppose. Only sensible explanation for it. I’ll radio Gabbro and ask them to go examine the satellite’s lens for defects.

entry.key: the Prisoner
entry.value: the Prisoner

entry.key: WaitingForOthersThis fire… what a warm and beautiful light it makes.
entry.value: This fire… what a warm and beautiful light it makes.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersGo, find the others. What comes next cannot be done alone.
entry.value: Go, find the others. What comes next cannot be done alone.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayI hadn’t dared to hope that anyone would hear the signal, for how briefly I set it free… Yet, here we are. Are you ready for the final step?
entry.value: I hadn’t dared to hope that anyone would hear the signal, for how briefly I set it free… Yet, here we are. Are you ready for the final step?

entry.key: the PrisonerReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Yes.

entry.key: the PrisonerReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Not yet.

entry.key: StartPlayingThen it’s time! Time to send our spark out into the darkness.
entry.value: Then it’s time! Time to send our spark out into the darkness.

entry.key: NotYetI have awaited this moment for a long time. For so long. It is no trouble to wait a little longer.
entry.value: I have awaited this moment for a long time. For so long. It is no trouble to wait a little longer.

entry.key: Farewell...How beautiful. It’s different than I’d envisioned.
entry.value: ...How beautiful. It’s different than I’d envisioned.

entry.key: FarewellWhatever happens next, I do not think it is to be feared.
entry.value: Whatever happens next, I do not think it is to be feared.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationWhen my kind found the Eye and realized what it was capable of, they were terrified. It was too difficult a truth. Like a light too bright to look upon directly, it burned them.
entry.value: When my kind found the Eye and realized what it was capable of, they were terrified. It was too difficult a truth. Like a light too bright to look upon directly, it burned them.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationWhat they could not unlearn was hidden away in darkness — obfuscated, then lost. They did not want to see their story end.
entry.value: What they could not unlearn was hidden away in darkness — obfuscated, then lost. They did not want to see their story end.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationMy kind weren’t always like this. We weren’t always so afraid. I did what I could to set things right, yet I am still of my kind, and you know now what they did. I cannot promise our fear won’t stain your mind.
entry.value: My kind weren’t always like this. We weren’t always so afraid. I did what I could to set things right, yet I am still of my kind, and you know now what they did. I cannot promise our fear won’t stain your mind.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationAnd so, a choice: Are you certain you want to remember me?
entry.value: And so, a choice: Are you certain you want to remember me?

entry.key: the PrisonerWaitingForInvitationJoin us. Let’s see what happens.
entry.value: Join us. Let’s see what happens.

entry.key: the PrisonerWaitingForInvitationYour journey is over now. You did well.
entry.value: Your journey is over now. You did well.

entry.key: the PrisonerWaitingForInvitationI’m not ready to decide.
entry.value: I’m not ready to decide.

entry.key: JoinUsI don’t want to repeat my kind’s mistakes. But if you’re willing to take the risk, then so am I.
entry.value: I don’t want to repeat my kind’s mistakes. But if you’re willing to take the risk, then so am I.

entry.key: YourJourneyIsOverMy role in this ended long ago, and now I’ve learned my efforts weren’t in vain. Thank you for facing what was hidden in the dark.
entry.value: My role in this ended long ago, and now I’ve learned my efforts weren’t in vain. Thank you for facing what was hidden in the dark.

entry.key: NotReadyEvery decision is made in darkness. Only by making a choice can we learn whether it was right or not.
entry.value: Every decision is made in darkness. Only by making a choice can we learn whether it was right or not.

entry.key: NotReadyI will wait until you are ready.
entry.value: I will wait until you are ready.

entry.key: Nomai1...
the PrisonerNomai1Who are you?
entry.value: Who are you?

entry.key: the PrisonerNomai1Where are we?
entry.value: Where are we?

entry.key: Nomai2...
IPNotFoundThe radio tower on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and housed some of the last-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.
entry.value: The radio tower on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and housed some of the last-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.

entry.key: IPNotFoundHornfels noticed a curious anomaly in one of the photos, but it ultimately went unexplained.
entry.value: Hornfels noticed a curious anomaly in one of the photos, but it ultimately went unexplained.

entry.key: IPFoundThe radio tower on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and housed some of the last-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.
entry.value: The radio tower on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and housed some of the last-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.

entry.key: IPFoundOne of these photos revealed the existence of an invisible ring world inhabited by a species whose presence in our solar system predated even the Nomai.
entry.value: One of these photos revealed the existence of an invisible ring world inhabited by a species whose presence in our solar system predated even the Nomai.

entry.key: IPDreamLibrariesFoundThis species traveled from a nearby star system in search of the Eye of the universe, but, horrified by what they discovered, decided to block the Eye’s signal so that no one else would ever find it.
entry.value: This species traveled from a nearby star system in search of the Eye of the universe, but, horrified by what they discovered, decided to block the Eye’s signal so that no one else would ever find it.

entry.key: IPFinishedOne individual, however, rebelled against the decision, and was able to briefly release the Eye’s signal back into space before being caught and imprisoned in solitude for this betrayal.
entry.value: One individual, however, rebelled against the decision, and was able to briefly release the Eye’s signal back into space before being caught and imprisoned in solitude for this betrayal.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Conoy, Daz and I were lifting Orbital Probe Cannon components into orbit for assembly, and one somehow sank down down beneath the current.
entry.value: CASSAVA: Conoy, Daz和我正将轨道探测砲组件送入轨道以进行组装，但其中一个组件不知为何沉入了洋流的下方。

entry.key: DAZ: Cassava convinced me not to try to recreate the phenomenon myself using other cannon parts, but we’re very curious to know what happened! How could something pass through the current?
entry.value: DAZ: Cassava劝我不要用探测砲组件去尝试重现这一现象，但我们十分好奇到底发生了什么！它怎么能穿过洋流呢？

entry.key: CONOY: My gratitude for your interesting question! This is exciting: Spire constructed a model of <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> here at <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>’s <color=orange>Southern Observatory</color>, and it's revealed how an object might sink below the current.
entry.value: CONOY: 感谢你有趣的问题！我们有了一个令人激动的发现: Spire在<color=lightblue>碎空星</color>的<color=orange>南部观测站</color>这里建造了一个<color=lightblue>深巨星</color>的模型，它揭示了物体可能是如何沉入洋流下方的。

entry.key: CASSAVA: Conoy, I’m unable to grasp the answer by looking through the <color=orange>projection pool</color>. If I visit the <color=orange>observatory</color>, would you kindly explain?
entry.value: CASSAVA: Conoy，只透过<color=orange>投影池</color>我不能理解问题的答案。请问你能在我来<color=orange>观测站</color>时为我讲解一下吗？

entry.key: CONOY: If you don’t mind the trek beneath the surface to the south pole, I’d be delighted to see you! (There are two trailheads, one at <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>'s <color=orange>gravity cannon</color> and one at the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color>.)
entry.value: CONOY: 如果你不介意在地表下跋涉到南极的话，我会很高兴与你见面的。(有两处道路起点，其中一个位于<color=lightblue>碎空星</color><color=orange>重力砲</color>，另一个位于<color=orange>量子知识之塔</color>。)

entry.key: DAZ: Conoy, you should’ve seen it! We’d thought it was impossible for any cannon components to sink even partially below the current, but ours sank straight to the core!
entry.value: DAZ: Conoy，你一定要研究下这件事！我们之前都以为任何探测砲组件都不可能沉入洋流下方，但这一个直接沉入了核心！

entry.key: COLEUS: I was upstairs testing the <color=orange>Eye signal locator</color>, and it can hear and follow the signals from the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>, and <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>.
entry.value: COLEUS: 我刚才在楼上测试<color=orange>眼信号定位器</color>，它能够接收并跟随来自<color=lightblue>太阳</color>、<color=lightblue>深巨星</color>和<color=lightblue>碎空星</color>的信号。

entry.key: COLEUS: However, something strange is happening when I ask the <color=orange>Eye signal locator</color> to follow the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal: The device’s indicator rotates wildly and never points to just one direction.
entry.value: COLEUS: 但当我让<color=orange>眼信号定位器</color>跟随<color=lightblue>眼</color>的信号时，奇怪的事发生了：仪器的指示器疯狂转动，无法指向任何方向。

entry.key: THATCH: This is a curious result. It’s possible the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> has stopped calling out its signal.
entry.value: THATCH: 这值得思考。有可能<color=lightblue>眼</color>已经停止发出它的信号了。

entry.key: FILIX: I see! I most likely calibrated the locator incorrectly. Privet (my apprentice) and I will make adjustments and try again.
entry.value: FILIX: 我明白了！很可能是我没有正确校准定位器。 Privet (我的学徒) 和我会做些调整后再试一次。

entry.key: FILIX: An update: Disappointingly, everything is correctly calibrated after all.
entry.value: FILIX: 更新：令人失望的是，仪器的校准没有任何问题。

entry.key: CASSAVA: It saddens me to posit this, my friends, but I believe this <color=orange>locator</color> cannot detect the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal. We would need to build a more sensitive device if we want to locate the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
entry.value: CASSAVA: 朋友们，我必须遗憾的指出，这个<color=orange>定位器</color>无法探测到<color=lightblue>眼</color>的信号。我们可能需要建造一个更灵敏的仪器来定位<color=lightblue>宇宙之眼</color>。

entry.key: THATCH: Then we will build it. Don’t lose hope, Cassava; our search for the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is what brought our clan to this place. We won’t give up so easily!
entry.value: THATCH: 那我们就造吧。Cassava，不要失去希望; 我们的家族来到此地的目的正是为了寻找<color=lightblue>眼</color>。我们不会如此轻易地放弃！

entry.key: Hal
entry.value: Hal

entry.key: Friend1aHey, hey, it’s my favorite astronaut! Launch day at last, huh, buddy? It’s the translator tool’s inaugural flight, too! I’m so excited it’s making me nauseous.
entry.value: Hey, hey, it’s my favorite astronaut! Launch day at last, huh, buddy? It’s the translator tool’s inaugural flight, too! I’m so excited it’s making me nauseous.

entry.key: Friend1aJust think - you’ll be able to translate any Nomai text you want, anywhere you are. The two of us put a lot of hours into inventing that tool, so don’t break it, okay? Haha! ...Oh, geez. Do not break it.
entry.value: Just think - you’ll be able to translate any Nomai text you want, anywhere you are. The two of us put a lot of hours into inventing that tool, so don’t break it, okay? Haha! ...Oh, geez. Do not break it.

entry.key: Friend1a...Ugh, ignore me, okay? I’m just nervous. And I’m not even the one going into space! How are you feeling?
entry.value: ...Ugh, ignore me, okay? I’m just nervous. And I’m not even the one going into space! How are you feeling?

entry.key: HalFriend1aI’m excited!
entry.value: I’m excited!

entry.key: HalFriend1aI’m terrified!
entry.value: I’m terrified!

entry.key: FriendExcitedGood! You’ve only been waiting for this day since we were hatchlings. I can’t wait to see all your training pay off!
entry.value: Good! You’ve only been waiting for this day since we were hatchlings. I can’t wait to see all your training pay off!

entry.key: FriendScaredAw, don’t let me make you nervous. You’ve been training for this day since we were hatchlings, remember? You’ll do great, I promise!
entry.value: Aw, don’t let me make you nervous. You’ve been training for this day since we were hatchlings, remember? You’ll do great, I promise!

entry.key: Friend1bSo what’s the dirt? You here to see the new Nomai statue?
entry.value: So what’s the dirt? You here to see the new Nomai statue?

entry.key: HalFriend1bNew statue?
entry.value: New statue?

entry.key: HalFriend1bOf course!
entry.value: Of course!

entry.key: HalFriend1bJust here for the launch codes.
entry.value: Just here for the launch codes.

entry.key: Friend2Heh, I knew you’d want to see it before you headed off! Hornfels just finished prepping it for display today. Amazing, isn’t it?
entry.value: Heh, I knew you’d want to see it before you headed off! Hornfels just finished prepping it for display today. Amazing, isn’t it?

entry.key: Friend3You haven’t heard? Gabbro brought it back with them from Giant’s Deep, and Hornfels just finished prepping it for display. This is it right here. Neat, huh?
entry.value: You haven’t heard? Gabbro brought it back with them from Giant’s Deep, and Hornfels just finished prepping it for display. This is it right here. Neat, huh?

entry.key: Friend4Yeah, I get that you’re dying to head out into space, but seriously, you’ve got to see this statue before you go. It’s an amazing find!
entry.value: Yeah, I get that you’re dying to head out into space, but seriously, you’ve got to see this statue before you go. It’s an amazing find!

entry.key: Friend5Makes me wish we could see what a real live Nomai looks like, but I guess this is as close as we’ll ever get. Check it out - looks like they had fur! Fur is weird.
entry.value: Makes me wish we could see what a real live Nomai looks like, but I guess this is as close as we’ll ever get. Check it out - looks like they had fur! Fur is weird.

entry.key: Friend5This is the first fully intact statue ever found, you know. And for how old it is, it’s in great shape!
entry.value: This is the first fully intact statue ever found, you know. And for how old it is, it’s in great shape!

entry.key: Friend5...Ah geez, I got a little carried away there. Go on, you have a ship to launch! Take care of yourself out there, you hear?
entry.value: ...Ah geez, I got a little carried away there. Go on, you have a ship to launch! Take care of yourself out there, you hear?

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenHey, I was just about to come find you! Look look look, you’ve gotta see this — the Nomai statue’s eyes are open!
entry.value: Hey, I was just about to come find you! Look look look, you’ve gotta see this — the Nomai statue’s eyes are open!

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenThey, uh, used to be closed. Probably should’ve started with that. And now they’ve opened!
entry.value: They, uh, used to be closed. Probably should’ve started with that. And now they’ve opened!

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenWe’re not sure why they opened, since no one actually saw it happen, but this is huge news!
entry.value: We’re not sure why they opened, since no one actually saw it happen, but this is huge news!

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenShould someone tell Gabbro? Or maybe Riebeck? Oh, stars, this is so exciting, it’s making my stomach hurt!
entry.value: Should someone tell Gabbro? Or maybe Riebeck? Oh, stars, this is so exciting, it’s making my stomach hurt!

entry.key: HalStatueEyesOpenHal! Can you help me translate this new alien language I found?
entry.value: Hal! Can you help me translate this new alien language I found?

entry.key: MoreTranslationA new language?! YES! Absolutely! Stars above, you BET I can!
entry.value: A new language?! YES! Absolutely! Stars above, you BET I can!

entry.key: MoreTranslationJust give me… let’s call it a hundred samples, some form of epigraphical codex, and six months, and I should have the vague gist of the sort of graphemes this new language is working with!
entry.value: Just give me… let’s call it a hundred samples, some form of epigraphical codex, and six months, and I should have the vague gist of the sort of graphemes this new language is working with!

entry.key: MoreTranslationGosh, I can’t wait to get started!
entry.value: Gosh, I can’t wait to get started!

entry.key: FriendNot5_TO_CHANGEHey again! What’s up?
entry.value: Hey again! What’s up?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEWhere on Giant’s Deep would I find Gabbro?
entry.value: Where on Giant’s Deep would I find Gabbro?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEWhere did this statue come from?
entry.value: Where did this statue come from?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEWhy did the Nomai make this statue?
entry.value: Why did the Nomai make this statue?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEThink I’ll discover anything cool in space?
entry.value: Think I’ll discover anything cool in space?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGESorry, nevermind.
entry.value: Sorry, nevermind.

entry.key: FriendMenuWas there something else?
entry.value: Was there something else?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuWhere’d you say this statue came from?
entry.value: Where’d you say this statue came from?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuWhere can I find Gabbro?
entry.value: Where can I find Gabbro?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuWhy did the Nomai make this statue?
entry.value: Why did the Nomai make this statue?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuThink I’ll discover anything cool in space?
entry.value: Think I’ll discover anything cool in space?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuNope, that was it.
entry.value: Nope, that was it.

entry.key: Friend6Good question! So Gabbro found this fully intact statue on Giant’s Deep, right? Well, Hornfels told me it’s made from the same type of special stone as the partial statue Chert brought back from the Hourglass Twins.
entry.value: Good question! So Gabbro found this fully intact statue on Giant’s Deep, right? Well, Hornfels told me it’s made from the same type of special stone as the partial statue Chert brought back from the Hourglass Twins.

entry.key: Friend6That’s why when Gabbro, you know, chipped the Giant’s Deep statue, that stone fragment was repurposed for your ship’s computer.
entry.value: That’s why when Gabbro, you know, chipped the Giant’s Deep statue, that stone fragment was repurposed for your ship’s computer.

entry.key: Friend6Maybe the statues were made for storing information?
entry.value: Maybe the statues were made for storing information?

entry.key: Friend7From Giant’s Deep! Gabbro fished it out of the oceans and brought it back here for study.
entry.value: From Giant’s Deep! Gabbro fished it out of the oceans and brought it back here for study.

entry.key: Friend7Hornfels doesn’t know much about it yet, just that it’s crazy old and super tough. I wonder why the Nomai carved it?
entry.value: Hornfels doesn’t know much about it yet, just that it’s crazy old and super tough. I wonder why the Nomai carved it?

entry.key: Friend7Apparently, Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the statue. Maybe they’ll find some answers there.
entry.value: Apparently, Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the statue. Maybe they’ll find some answers there.

entry.key: Friend8Hey, you never know — maybe you’ll be the one to solve the mysteries of the Nomai!
entry.value: Hey, you never know — maybe you’ll be the one to solve the mysteries of the Nomai!

entry.key: Friend8Or maybe you’ll discover a new kind of rock or something.
entry.value: Or maybe you’ll discover a new kind of rock or something.

entry.key: Friend8But honestly, as long as they don’t end up naming new safety equipment after you, I’m sure you’ll have done a great job.
entry.value: But honestly, as long as they don’t end up naming new safety equipment after you, I’m sure you’ll have done a great job.

entry.key: Friend9No problem. Take it easy!
entry.value: No problem. Take it easy!

entry.key: Friend10Alright then! Be careful out there, okay?
entry.value: Alright then! Be careful out there, okay?

entry.key: WheresGabbroGabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep to wherever they found that Nomai statue. One of the islands, I think.
entry.value: Gabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep to wherever they found that Nomai statue. One of the islands, I think.

entry.key: WheresGabbroYou remember Gabbro plays a flute, right? Like, all the time? I bet your signalscope could find them easily.
entry.value: You remember Gabbro plays a flute, right? Like, all the time? I bet your signalscope could find them easily.

entry.key: WheresGabbroIf you do see Gabbro, say hi for me!
entry.value: If you do see Gabbro, say hi for me!

entry.key: ANNONA: The <color=orange>Quantum Moon locator</color> is functioning. We have markers for each of the places the moon goes.
entry.value: ANNONA: <color=orange>量子卫星定位器</color>正在运行。我们建造了标记以指示卫星可到达的每个位置。

entry.key: MELORAE: Annona, Bur, I just observed the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> in orbit around <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.
entry.value: MELORAE: Annona，Bur，我刚观察到<color=lightblue>量子卫星</color>正环绕<color=lightblue>黑棘星</color>运动。

entry.key: ANNONA: You have keen eyes, my friend. So this moon travels to a total of five locations, not four.
entry.value: ANNONA: 你的眼力很好，我的朋友。看来这颗卫星总共在五个位置运动，而不是四个。

entry.key: BUR: I added a marker for <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.
entry.value: BUR: 我加上了<color=lightblue>黑棘星</color>的标记。

entry.key: BUR: I thought the <color=orange>locator</color> now accounted for all of the <color=lightblue>phantom moon</color>’s locations, but sometimes the <color=orange>locator</color> can’t tell where the moon is. Perhaps there’s a problem with the device?
entry.value: BUR: 我以为<color=orange>定位器</color>已经包含了<color=lightblue>幻影卫星</color>的所有位置，但有时<color=orange>定位器</color>无法指示它的位置。也许仪器有问题？

entry.key: MELORAE: It’s also possible there exists a sixth place in this star system to which the <color=lightblue>phantom moon</color> travels.
entry.value: MELORAE: 这个太阳系中也有可能存在<color=lightblue>幻影卫星</color>能移动到的第六个位置。

entry.key: MELORAE: If you’ve come here to look for Coleus, this is where we were when he vanished. He’s been missing for two days now!
entry.value: MELORAE: 如果你是来寻找Coleus的，他就是在此地消失的。他已经失踪两天了！

entry.key: ANNONA: Your strange, wandering rock friend is here, though Coleus isn’t.
entry.value: ANNONA: 你那奇怪的，游荡的岩石朋友还在这里，但Coleus却不见了。

entry.key: MELORAE: Coleus and I observed this unusual-looking rock shard (and several smaller rocks) in at least two other caverns. I’m unsure if this is relevant.
entry.value: MELORAE: Coleus和我在至少其他两处洞穴都观察到这块奇怪的岩石碎片（和其他几块小点的石头）。我不确定这件事是否与之有关。

entry.key: BUR: What happened before Coleus disappeared?
entry.value: BUR: Coleus消失前发生了什么？

entry.key: MELORAE: We were examining the different rocks. I recall Coleus standing on the largest one (the wandering rock). I was taking notes, and then my lantern died.
entry.value: MELORAE: 我们当时正在观察这些岩石。我想起当时Coleus站在了最大的一块岩石上（那块游荡的岩石）。我正在做记录，然后我的灯突然熄灭了。

entry.key: MELORAE: When I lit it again, Coleus and the rock were both gone.
entry.value: MELORAE: 当我重新点亮它后，Coleus和那块岩石都不见了。

entry.key: Should we build the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> to power the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>?
entry.value: 我们是否应该建造<color=orange>太阳站</color>来为<color=orange>灰烬星工程</color>提供能量？

entry.key: IDAEA: I almost can’t comprehend this is being suggested seriously. The purpose of the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> goes against every standard we hold ourselves to and everything we believe in as a species!
entry.value: IDAEA: 我真是无法理解为什么会有人提出这种方案。<color=orange>太阳站</color>的作用完全背叛了我们作为一个种族的所有信念与准则！

entry.key: PYE: Unsurprisingly, Idaea, I disagree. We’re pushing a possible new technology further than ever before. That, in my experience, is the defining characteristic of our species.
