entry.key: MELORAE: Friends, if you find any sign of Coleus, I implore you to tell me! He vanished without a trace during our research trip, and has been missing ever since.
entry.value: MELORAE: Friends, if you find any sign of Coleus, I implore you to tell me! He vanished without a trace during our research trip, and has been missing ever since.

entry.key: BUR: Melorae, some of us from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> are here to help search for Coleus. Can you tell us more about your expedition?
entry.value: BUR: Melorae, some of us from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> are here to help search for Coleus. Can you tell us more about your expedition?

entry.key: MELORAE: You have my gratitude, Bur! Coleus and I were studying the caves’ geology. We hoped to learn more about a unique and wandering rock that visits several different caves in the area.
entry.value: MELORAE: You have my gratitude, Bur! Coleus and I were studying the caves’ geology. We hoped to learn more about a unique and wandering rock that visits several different caves in the area.

entry.key: ANNONA: Where was young Coleus lost, Melorae?
entry.value: ANNONA: Where was young Coleus lost, Melorae?

entry.key: MELORAE: He disappeared in the cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at the north pole. It happened in an instant, and without warning.
entry.value: MELORAE: He disappeared in the cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at the north pole. It happened in an instant, and without warning.

entry.key: MELORAE: I turned away from Coleus to examine a sample, and when I turned back, he simply wasn’t there anymore. He had a limited supply of air, Annona! I’m afraid for him!
entry.value: MELORAE: I turned away from Coleus to examine a sample, and when I turned back, he simply wasn’t there anymore. He had a limited supply of air, Annona! I’m afraid for him!

entry.key: ANNONA: Hypothesis: We will learn more by examining the northern <color=orange>Lakebed Cave</color> where Coleus disappeared. Search quickly, everyone; we have no time to squander!
entry.value: ANNONA: Hypothesis: We will learn more by examining the northern <color=orange>Lakebed Cave</color> where Coleus disappeared. Search quickly, everyone; we have no time to squander!

entry.key: <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>
entry.value: <color=orange>高能实验室</color>

entry.key: SECCA: To any who come here searching for us: We followed one of the two beacons from the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to this place, but now can go no further.
entry.value: SECCA: To any who come here searching for us: We followed one of the two beacons from the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to this place, but now can go no further.

entry.key: SECCA: It’s almost too faint to hear now, but the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is still faintly emitting from within this thorny seed. Yet the opening is too small for even a single Nomai to fit through it, so our <color=orange>escape pod</color> couldn’t have flown through here.
entry.value: SECCA: It's almost too faint to hear now, but the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is still faintly emitting from within this thorny seed. Yet the opening is too small for even a single Nomai to fit through it, so our <color=orange>escape pod</color> couldn’t have flown through here.

entry.key: SECCA: I don’t understand how this could be possible, but this gruesome place seems able to manipulate space itself; maybe this was our undoing.
entry.value: SECCA: I don’t understand how this could be possible, but this gruesome place seems able to manipulate space itself; maybe this was our undoing.

entry.key: SECCA: To be so close to the location of the <color=orange>Vessel</color> and still so far is... difficult. Worse, the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is dying; soon, we will be unable to hear it.
entry.value: SECCA: To be so close to the location of the <color=orange>Vessel</color> and still so far is... difficult. Worse, the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is dying; soon, we will be unable to hear it.

entry.key: SECCA: There is nothing we can do now but try to perhaps find a way inside, or at least attempt to comprehend why this happened.
entry.value: SECCA: There is nothing we can do now but try to perhaps find a way inside, or at least attempt to comprehend why this happened.

entry.key: SECCA: My dearest hope is that the other escape pods were able to reach relative safety.
entry.value: SECCA: My dearest hope is that the other escape pods were able to reach relative safety.

entry.key: DIN: There is a new problem: Our equipment is detecting two distinct beacons from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: DIN: There is a new problem: Our equipment is detecting two distinct beacons from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>.

entry.key: SECCA: But it isn’t possible for the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to be in two different locations at the same time.
entry.value: SECCA: But it isn’t possible for the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to be in two different locations at the same time.

entry.key: DIN: I agree, but the beacons are exactly identical to each other. Perhaps if I had more time —
entry.value: DIN: I agree, but the beacons are exactly identical to each other. Perhaps if I had more time —

entry.key: SECCA: We’re nearly out of time already, Din; the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is quickly fading. Soon, it will be gone, and we will be lost.
entry.value: SECCA: We’re nearly out of time already, Din; the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is quickly fading. Soon, it will be gone, and we will be lost.

entry.key: ESCALL: We will follow the beacon whose source is nearest to us.
entry.value: ESCALL: We will follow the beacon whose source is nearest to us.

entry.key: DIN: But suppose that beacon is false!
entry.value: DIN: But suppose that beacon is false!

entry.key: ESCALL: We likely don’t have enough air to reach the farther of the two beacons, Din. The decision is made for us.
entry.value: ESCALL: We likely don’t have enough air to reach the farther of the two beacons, Din. The decision is made for us.

entry.key: ESCALL: We’ll leave a trail of lights as we go. There’s still a chance someone could hear our <color=orange>escape pod</color>’s distress signal.
entry.value: ESCALL: We’ll leave a trail of lights as we go. There’s still a chance someone could hear our <color=orange>escape pod</color>’s distress signal.

entry.key: BEGIN FLIGHTLOG: <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>. <color=orange>Vessel</color> has been mortally injured. Emergency sequence activated. Awaiting departure from <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: BEGIN FLIGHTLOG: <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>. <color=orange>Vessel</color> has been mortally injured. Emergency sequence activated. Awaiting departure from <color=orange>Vessel</color>.

entry.key: Now launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>.
entry.value: Now launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>.

entry.key: ALERT: Multiple collisions have altered pod’s trajectory. Significant damage to pod detected.
entry.value: ALERT: Multiple collisions have altered pod’s trajectory. Significant damage to pod detected.

entry.key: WARNING: Navigation error. Life support error. Propulsion error.
entry.value: WARNING: Navigation error. Life support error. Propulsion error.

entry.key: Scanning external environment... Scan complete. Gravity not detected. Breathable air not detected. Multiple lifeforms detected (potentially hostile). Verdict: DO NOT EXIT POD.
entry.value: Scanning external environment... Scan complete. Gravity not detected. Breathable air not detected. Multiple lifeforms detected (potentially hostile). Verdict: DO NOT EXIT POD.

entry.key: The arch and the crystal do not naturally meet.
entry.value: The arch and the crystal do not naturally meet.

entry.key: PHLOX: I’m curious: Is sending a being’s memories back in time the same as sending the being itself back in time?
entry.value: PHLOX: I’m curious: Is sending a being’s memories back in time the same as sending the being itself back in time?

entry.key: PHLOX: As an example, if we were to send my memories back in time, is that the same as sending “me” back in time (not my physical body, but my essence)?
entry.value: PHLOX: As an example, if we were to send my memories back in time, is that the same as sending “me” back in time (not my physical body, but my essence)?

entry.key: DAZ: I imagine they’re two different actions.
entry.value: DAZ: I imagine they’re two different actions.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Wouldn’t both actions be effectively the same?
entry.value: CASSAVA: Wouldn’t both actions be effectively the same?

entry.key: DAZ: Suppose that time was being rewritten. I believe this is different than receiving memories from what is effectively the future.
entry.value: DAZ: Suppose that time was being rewritten. I believe this is different than receiving memories from what is effectively the future.

entry.key: CASSAVA: But isn’t the end result identical in either case?
entry.value: CASSAVA: But isn’t the end result identical in either case?

entry.key: PHLOX: Welcome to Giant’s Deep, friends! I’m excited for you to meet the statues!
entry.value: PHLOX: Welcome to Giant’s Deep, friends! I’m excited for you to meet the statues!

entry.key: PHLOX: If I’m not in my dwelling, I’m likely in my <color=orange>workshop</color> below (inside the island).
entry.value: PHLOX: If I’m not in my dwelling, I’m likely in my <color=orange>workshop</color> below (inside the island).

entry.key: <color=orange>ORBITAL PROBE CANNON</color> DAMAGE REPORT: Severe structural stress detected. Assessing damage to modules...
entry.value: <color=orange>轨道探测砲</color>损伤报告：检测到严重的结构应力。评估模块受损情况...

entry.key: <color=orange>Control Module</color>: Intact. No structural damage.
entry.value: <color=orange>控制模块</color>：完好。无结构损伤。

entry.key: <color=orange>Launch Module</color>: Viewport window fractured. Module exposed to vacuum of space.
entry.value: <color=orange>发射模块</color>：观察窗破裂。模块暴露在真空中。

entry.key: <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>: MISSING.
entry.value: <color=orange>探测器追踪模块</color>：丢失。

entry.key: BEGIN LAUNCH LOG: <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>. Launch request received. Probe launch successful.
entry.value: 开始发射日志：<color=orange>轨道探测砲</color>。收到发射请求。探测器发射成功。

entry.key: <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> is receiving data from probe.
entry.value: <color=orange>探测器追踪模块</color>正在接收探测器传来的数据。

entry.key: WARNING: <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> structure compromised during launch. Damage to multiple modules detected.
entry.value: 警告：<color=orange>轨道探测砲</color>结构在发射时受损。检测到多个模块受损。

entry.key: Probe Tracking Module
entry.value: <color=orange>探测器追踪模块</color>

entry.key: You have recalled the rule of quantum imaging.
entry.value: 你已回想了量子成像法则。

entry.key: Recall the rule of quantum entanglement.
entry.value: 请回想量子纠缠法则。

entry.key: Recall the rule of the sixth location.
entry.value: 请回想第六地点法则。

entry.key: SOLANUM: I’m at the shuttle! I’m ready to make my first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.
entry.value: SOLANUM: I’m at the shuttle! I’m ready to make my first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.

entry.key: BELLS: That’s exciting! You’re almost ready, but there’s still one more rule you need to learn. Come see me at the Tower of Quantum Knowledge.
entry.value: BELLS: That’s exciting! You’re almost ready, but there’s still one more rule you need to learn. Come see me at the Tower of Quantum Knowledge.

entry.key: BELLS: The tower is on the opposite side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>. If you follow the path west to the <color=orange>Crossroads</color>, you can reach the tower from there.
entry.value: BELLS: The tower is on the opposite side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>. If you follow the path west to the <color=orange>Crossroads</color>, you can reach the tower from there.

entry.key: SOLANUM: My gratitude for the directions, Bells. I’ll see you soon!
entry.value: SOLANUM: My gratitude for the directions, Bells. I’ll see you soon!

entry.key: CASSAVA: I have bad news, Avens. Yarrow says there was a problem with the proposed power source, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> won’t be asked to fire.
entry.value: CASSAVA: I have bad news, Avens. Yarrow says there was a problem with the proposed power source, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> won’t be asked to fire.

entry.key: AVENS: I hope you’re pulling my locomotive limb here, Cassava.
entry.value: AVENS: I hope you’re pulling my locomotive limb here, Cassava.

entry.key: CASSAVA: I wish I were, my friend, but no. They aren’t certain they can fix the problem, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> is on indefinite hiatus.
entry.value: CASSAVA: I wish I were, my friend, but no. They aren’t certain they can fix the problem, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> is on indefinite hiatus.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Tell Privet and Mallow they should return from the <color=orange>cannon</color>. My spouse and I will remain at the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color>, for now.
entry.value: CASSAVA: Tell Privet and Mallow they should return from the <color=orange>cannon</color>. My spouse and I will remain at the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color>, for now.

entry.key: AVENS: An update: Mallow and I will join you and Daz. Privet left to visit her brother. She fears Idaea may feel responsible.
entry.value: AVENS: An update: Mallow and I will join you and Daz. Privet left to visit her brother. She fears Idaea may feel responsible.

entry.key: MALLOW: Imagine, Privet: the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> will be the first to know the coordinates of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>! You’ll be the first to see them!
entry.value: MALLOW: Imagine, Privet: the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> will be the first to know the coordinates of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>! You’ll be the first to see them!

entry.key: PRIVET: I am honored and terrified!
entry.value: PRIVET: I am honored and terrified!

entry.key: PRIVET: You won’t ask the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> to use so much power that it breaks, will you?
entry.value: PRIVET: You won’t ask the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> to use so much power that it breaks, will you?

entry.key: MALLOW: Fret not, my nervous friend! We only need to fire the probe once, anyway, so who minds if it compromises the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>’s structural integrity slightly?
entry.value: MALLOW: Fret not, my nervous friend! We only need to fire the probe once, anyway, so who minds if it compromises the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>’s structural integrity slightly?

entry.key: PRIVET: I would mind, Mallow! I would mind, because we won’t be capable of receiving our probe’s data if the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> is destroyed!
entry.value: PRIVET: I would mind, Mallow! I would mind, because we won’t be capable of receiving our probe’s data if the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> is destroyed!

entry.key: AVENS: Mallow, my better 50 percent! Cassava is sending the last of the <color=orange>cannon</color> components. Soon (relatively speaking), we’ll know the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s precise location!
entry.value: AVENS: Mallow, my better 50 percent! Cassava is sending the last of the <color=orange>cannon</color> components. Soon (relatively speaking), we’ll know the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s precise location!

entry.key: MALLOW: The thought of concluding our elders’ curious and challenging search increases my heart’s temperature, my love!
entry.value: MALLOW: The thought of concluding our elders’ curious and challenging search increases my heart’s temperature, my love!

entry.key: AVENS: Cassava tells me he and the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color> crew have determined a power setting we are not, under any circumstances, to go above.
entry.value: AVENS: Cassava tells me he and the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color> crew have determined a power setting we are not, under any circumstances, to go above.

entry.key: MALLOW: I see! And am I right to think that, consequently, we’ll be ignoring that setting?
entry.value: MALLOW: I see! And am I right to think that, consequently, we’ll be ignoring that setting?

entry.key: AVENS: I can posit with nearly 100 percent certainty our friends have accounted for our natures, so I suggest we do!
entry.value: AVENS: I can posit with nearly 100 percent certainty our friends have accounted for our natures, so I suggest we do!

entry.key: AVENS: Giving the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> all the power it can structurally withstand creates the greatest chance of finding the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
entry.value: AVENS: Giving the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> all the power it can structurally withstand creates the greatest chance of finding the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.

entry.key: MALLOW: Yes, the probe must travel as fast as it can, as far as it can. I’ll make some adjustments!
entry.value: MALLOW: Yes, the probe must travel as fast as it can, as far as it can. I’ll make some adjustments!

entry.key: YARROW: I have exciting news, Privet: The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is almost prepared to receive the probe data from the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>.
entry.value: YARROW: I have exciting news, Privet: The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is almost prepared to receive the probe data from the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>.

entry.key: YARROW: Ramie is adding some finishing touches here, but she’ll be finished soon. Are you and the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> well?
entry.value: YARROW: Ramie is adding some finishing touches here, but she’ll be finished soon. Are you and the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> well?

entry.key: PRIVET: We are! The statue here in the<color=orange> Probe Tracking Module </color>is ready to record each launch’s flight trajectory and will automatically transmit all relevant data to you.
entry.value: PRIVET: We are! The statue here in the<color=orange> Probe Tracking Module </color>is ready to record each launch’s flight trajectory and will automatically transmit all relevant data to you.

entry.key: PRIVET: Once the probe determines the location of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>, I’ll send an alert directly to you and Ramie.
entry.value: PRIVET: Once the probe determines the location of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>, I’ll send an alert directly to you and Ramie.

entry.key: PRIVET: On the other appendage, I’m now worried about this <color=orange>cannon</color>’s structural integrity and its crew’s moral integrity.
entry.value: PRIVET: On the other appendage, I’m now worried about this <color=orange>cannon</color>’s structural integrity and its crew’s moral integrity.

entry.key: YARROW: What happened? Did the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> not fire?
entry.value: YARROW: What happened? Did the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> not fire?

entry.key: PYE: It fired, Yarrow. But it failed. The <color=lightblue>sun</color> barely responded; there were infintestimally small surface-level changes, but they were barely visible, even to the third eye.
entry.value: PYE: It fired, Yarrow. But it failed. The <color=lightblue>sun</color> barely responded; there were infintestimally small surface-level changes, but they were barely visible, even to the third eye.

entry.key: PYE: The Sun Station is useless. It will never, and could never, cause the sun to explode.
entry.value: PYE: The Sun Station is useless. It will never, and could never, cause the sun to explode.

entry.key: PYE: I don’t know what comes next, my friends. I suppose we must start over, but I’m unsure how to start over.
entry.value: PYE: I don’t know what comes next, my friends. I suppose we must start over, but I’m unsure how to start over.

entry.key: YARROW: Return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> first, my friend. Perhaps a change of task would help: Spire noticed a comet approaching this star system that we’d like to investigate.
entry.value: YARROW: Return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> first, my friend. Perhaps a change of task would help: Spire noticed a comet approaching this star system that we’d like to investigate.

entry.key: YARROW: Pye... I hurt for you, my friends; we all know how hard you’ve both worked. I can only offer my compassion. How are you? How is Idaea?
entry.value: YARROW: Pye... I hurt for you, my friends; we all know how hard you’ve both worked. I can only offer my compassion. How are you? How is Idaea?

entry.key: IDAEA: We’re well, Yarrow (or as well as can be expected, given the circumstances), though disappointed. I may have disagreed with exploding the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, but I never wished the device would fail. I’d hoped our terrible work was finished.
entry.value: IDAEA: We’re well, Yarrow (or as well as can be expected, given the circumstances), though disappointed. I may have disagreed with exploding the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, but I never wished the device would fail. I’d hoped our terrible work was finished.

entry.key: Star has reached end of natural life cycle. Now approaching red giant stage. WARNING: Evacuate <color=orange>Sun Station</color>.
entry.value: 太阳已接近自然生命周期的结束。现已接近红巨星阶段。警告：撤离<color=orange>太阳站</color>。

entry.key: Approximate time until <color=orange>Sun Station</color> is destroyed by expanding star: <RemainingMinutes> MINUTES, <RemainingSeconds> SECONDS\\nApproximate time until star’s death: <MinutesToRedGiant> MINUTES, <SecondsToRedGiant> SECONDS
entry.value: 距离<color=orange>太阳站</color>被膨胀的太阳摧毁还有大约：<RemainingMinutes>分<RemainingSeconds>秒\\n距离太阳死亡还有大约：<MinutesToRedGiant>分<SecondsToRedGiant>秒

entry.key: YARROW: Phlox and Daz finished the memory statues today, and they are truly remarkable.
entry.value: YARROW: Phlox and Daz finished the memory statues today, and they are truly remarkable.

entry.key: YARROW: When the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> succeeds (or in the event it fails), the memory statues will activate, allowing us to gather more data before we shut down the project.
entry.value: YARROW: When the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> succeeds (or in the event it fails), the memory statues will activate, allowing us to gather more data before we shut down the project.

entry.key: CLARY: Here’s our first delivery, Yarrow: one warp core, fresh from the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>! Root is installing this core’s sibling on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> as I write this.
entry.value: CLARY: Here’s our first delivery, Yarrow: one warp core, fresh from the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>! Root is installing this core’s sibling on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> as I write this.

entry.key: CLARY: I wish I could wait here for you to arrive, but the forge (and my unfinished work there) is calling. I’ll return with more materials soon.
entry.value: CLARY: I wish I could wait here for you to arrive, but the forge (and my unfinished work there) is calling. I’ll return with more materials soon.

entry.key: YARROW: My gratitude, Clary! With this, the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is underway!
entry.value: YARROW: My gratitude, Clary! With this, the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is underway!

entry.key: YARROW: I confess, I’m deeply curious about what you and Poke found on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> that started this project. Could I visit sometime to learn more?
entry.value: YARROW: I confess, I’m deeply curious about what you and Poke found on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> that started this project. Could I visit sometime to learn more?

entry.key: CLARY: I recommend you do! The <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> is the model for the towers being built for the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, so a visit to the station would be doubly useful.
entry.value: CLARY: I recommend you do! The <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> is the model for the towers being built for the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, so a visit to the station would be doubly useful.

entry.key: YARROW: I suppose, more precisely, I would like to visit the White Hole Station with you, Clary.
entry.value: YARROW: I suppose, more precisely, I would like to visit the White Hole Station with you, Clary.

entry.key: CLARY: I’d be happy to explain our findings!
entry.value: CLARY: I’d be happy to explain our findings!

entry.key: POKE: Yarrow, stop using this scroll wall to flirt with my sister (in romantic matters, her density rivals a neutron star’s) and go meet her on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>.
entry.value: POKE: Yarrow, stop using this scroll wall to flirt with my sister (in romantic matters, her density rivals a neutron star’s) and go meet her on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>.

entry.key: CLARY: To our friends on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>: I just warped here from the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> (on the other side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>’s black hole)! Our design worked; we’ve successfully recreated warp travel!
entry.value: CLARY: To our friends on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>: I just warped here from the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> (on the other side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>’s black hole)! Our design worked; we’ve successfully recreated warp travel!

entry.key: FILIX: This is wonderful news! I can’t wait to see the warp tower (although it’s been a long time since I’ve jumped through a black hole!).
entry.value: FILIX: This is wonderful news! I can’t wait to see the warp tower (although it’s been a long time since I’ve jumped through a black hole!).

entry.key: POKE: I don’t know how close it is to Annona’s original design, but as long as what we’ve built works, then I’m delighted! I knew we could do it (Cassava, I hope you’re reading this)!
entry.value: POKE: I don’t know how close it is to Annona’s original design, but as long as what we’ve built works, then I’m delighted! I knew we could do it (Cassava, I hope you’re reading this)!

entry.key: POKE: Wait, this can’t be correct. Clary, have you seen these readings? If they were accurate, they would violate causality. There must be an equipment error somewhere.
entry.value: POKE: Wait, this can’t be correct. Clary, have you seen these readings? If they were accurate, they would violate causality. There must be an equipment error somewhere.

entry.key: POKE: I’m returning to the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>. If you and Root meet me there, we can run a full diagnostic and hopefully locate the problem.
entry.value: POKE: I’m returning to the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>. If you and Root meet me there, we can run a full diagnostic and hopefully locate the problem.

entry.key: POKE: (Don’t tell Cassava.)
entry.value: POKE: (Don’t tell Cassava.)

entry.key: PYE: Ramie and I reviewed the records you sent, Poke, and they appear to show Nomai are arriving at the warp receiver on Brittle Hollow slightly before departing from the White Hole Station.
entry.value: PYE: Ramie and I reviewed the records you sent, Poke, and they appear to show Nomai are arriving at the warp receiver on Brittle Hollow slightly before departing from the White Hole Station.

entry.key: POKE: I understand it’s exceedingly odd, but Clary and I have tested and retested the equipment, and the result is the same every time someone warps.
entry.value: POKE: I understand it’s exceedingly odd, but Clary and I have tested and retested the equipment, and the result is the same every time someone warps.

entry.key: RAMIE: The interval is incredibly miniscule (roughly one hundred-thousandth of a second). Do you suppose our instruments can’t accurately measure time to such a small degree?
entry.value: RAMIE: The interval is incredibly minuscule (roughly one hundred-thousandth of a second). Do you suppose our instruments can’t accurately measure time to such a small degree?

entry.key: PYE: As I’ve already told Ramie, these measurements can’t be accurate. How can a Nomai arrive on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> before he or she ever stepped into the teleporter? The implications are absurd.
entry.value: PYE: As I’ve already told Ramie, these measurements can’t be accurate. How can a Nomai arrive on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> before he or she ever stepped into the teleporter? The implications are absurd.

entry.key: POKE: I don’t disagree. It would mean I’ve inadvertently broken several fundamental theories regarding this universe. We would have to reconsider all of our beliefs about the nature of time.
entry.value: POKE: I don’t disagree. It would mean I’ve inadvertently broken several fundamental theories regarding this universe. We would have to reconsider all of our beliefs about the nature of time.

entry.key: RAMIE: Yes, I hope so, too!
entry.value: RAMIE: Yes, I hope so, too!

entry.key: RAMIE: Poke, as Pye is confident the reading is inaccurate, she’s kindly helping me attempt to recreate this phenomenon at the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>. We’re designing an experiment to take more data.
entry.value: RAMIE: Poke, as Pye is confident the reading is inaccurate, she’s kindly helping me attempt to recreate this phenomenon at the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>. We’re designing an experiment to take more data.

entry.key: PYE: An update: Poke, the High Energy Lab is in the canyon on Ember Twin’s equator. Come here at once. You need to see this.
entry.value: PYE: An update: Poke, the High Energy Lab is in the canyon on Ember Twin’s equator. Come here at once. You need to see this.

entry.key: SignChert’s Research Notes — property of Chert!
entry.value: Chert的研究笔记——Chert的个人所有！

entry.key: SignThis is an old crater. The neat thing here is that the composition of the samples I took from the impact site matches the composition of the ice on the outskirts of <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.
entry.value: This is an old crater. The neat thing here is that the composition of the samples I took from the impact site matches the composition of the ice on the outskirts of <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.

entry.key: SignI’d posit the <color=lightblue>Attlerock</color> was hit with a piece of the planet that used to be where <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color> now lies.
entry.value: I’d posit the <color=lightblue>Attlerock</color> was hit with a piece of the planet that used to be where <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color> now lies.

entry.key: SignTo follow up on — maybe there are more fragments of the old planet <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color> destroyed on other astral bodies in the solar system?
entry.value: To follow up on — maybe there are more fragments of the old planet <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color> destroyed on other astral bodies in the solar system?

entry.key: SignChert’s Research Notes - property of Chert!
entry.value: Chert’s Research Notes - property of Chert!

entry.key: SignClearly, the Nomai were making astronomical observations here. They chose an excellent spot!
entry.value: Clearly, the Nomai were making astronomical observations here. They chose an excellent spot!

entry.key: SignWhat is this big, rotating device for? What was it the Nomai were observing?
entry.value: What is this big, rotating device for? What was it the Nomai were observing?

entry.key: SignI’d posit there’s something special about the orange symbol on that device. Hal and the new astronaut’s translator tool would be nice to have handy about now.
entry.value: I’d posit there’s something special about the orange symbol on that device. Hal and the new astronaut’s translator tool would be nice to have handy about now.

entry.key: SignI’ve detected a strange signal coming from somewhere within the grove in this crater.
entry.value: I’ve detected a strange signal coming from somewhere within the grove in this crater.

entry.key: SignIt’s very similar to the signal emitted by the Quantum Moon, so it stands to reason the two signals are probably related.
entry.value: It’s very similar to the signal emitted by the Quantum Moon, so it stands to reason the two signals are probably related.

entry.key: SignWe don’t know much about the Quantum Moon, seeing as no one’s ever been able to land on it, but hopefully studying the signal in the grove will reveal more about it.
entry.value: We don’t know much about the Quantum Moon, seeing as no one’s ever been able to land on it, but hopefully studying the signal in the grove will reveal more about it.

entry.key: SignEsker’s Signalscope Log
entry.value: Esker的信号镜日志

entry.key: SignDay 48: Still not picking up Riebeck’s banjo from Brittle Hollow. I’m sure they’re fine, but I’ll feel better once I can hear their music.
entry.value: Day 48: Still not picking up Riebeck’s banjo from Brittle Hollow. I’m sure they’re fine, but I’ll feel better once I can hear their music.

entry.key: SignDay 51: Listened to Chert play for a while today. Unrelated, someone should tell Porphy and Gossan their flirting is not subtle from an aerial perspective.
entry.value: Day 51: Listened to Chert play for a while today. Unrelated, someone should tell Porphy and Gossan their flirting is not subtle from an aerial perspective.

entry.key: SignDay 55: Banjo music coming in loud and clear today! Sounds like Riebeck’s doing okay. That oaf, I was worried!
entry.value: Day 55: Banjo music coming in loud and clear today! Sounds like Riebeck’s doing okay. That oaf, I was worried!

entry.key: SignDay 63: Today I thought I heard something... strange. I don’t know — it was probably nothing.
entry.value: Day 63: Today I thought I heard something... strange. I don’t know — it was probably nothing.

entry.key: SignDay 70: No, it’s back again today, too. Something strange is coming from Timber Hearth.
entry.value: Day 70: No, it’s back again today, too. Something strange is coming from Timber Hearth.

entry.key: SignDay 76: Okay, I know this is crazy, but the sound from Timber Hearth sounds exactly like Feldspar’s harmonica. But Feldspar disappeared in space ages ago. It can’t be them...
entry.value: Day 76: Okay, I know this is crazy, but the sound from Timber Hearth sounds exactly like Feldspar’s harmonica. But Feldspar disappeared in space ages ago. It can’t be them...

entry.key: SignDay 88: It’s still here. This is creepy. Maybe my signalscope is broken? I’d better talk to Gneiss.
entry.value: Day 88: It’s still here. This is creepy. Maybe my signalscope is broken? I’d better talk to Gneiss.

entry.key: SignFELDSPAR’S SPARE JETPACK FUEL
entry.value: FELDSPAR的备用喷气背包燃料

entry.key: SignIt’s annoying to schlep across the planet to the ship if I can’t use my jetpack, so I’m leaving this here.
entry.value: It’s annoying to schlep across the planet to the ship if I can’t use my jetpack, so I’m leaving this here.

entry.key: SignI checked with my Little Scout — I do too use it, Hornfels, ya burnt marshmallow — and the scout’s integrity reading said this piece of Brittle Hollow is as stable as any, but who knows.
entry.value: I checked with my Little Scout — I do too use it, Hornfels, ya burnt marshmallow — and the scout’s integrity reading said this piece of Brittle Hollow is as stable as any, but who knows.

entry.key: SignIf the fuel’s still around, feel free to use it. If not, well, wherever you’re reading this note, I’m sure you’ve got bigger problems.
entry.value: If the fuel’s still around, feel free to use it. If not, well, wherever you’re reading this note, I’m sure you’ve got bigger problems.

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1Trip 4, entry # whatever \\n Crashes: 2 \\n Boring crashes: 0 (remember to see Slate when I get back)
entry.value: Trip 4, entry # whatever \\n Crashes: 2 \\n Boring crashes: 0 (remember to see Slate when I get back)

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1Ha ha, yeah! Yeah! All the way down to the core! Consider yourself conquered, Giant’s Deep — you just got Feldsparred.
entry.value: Ha ha, yeah! Yeah! All the way down to the core! Consider yourself conquered, Giant’s Deep — you just got Feldsparred.

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1That was one of my more dramatic feats, if I do say so myself. Can’t believe I wasn’t electrocuted! Ahhh, can’t wait to tell Hornfels and Gossan about this one — I guess brute force isn’t always the answer.
entry.value: That was one of my more dramatic feats, if I do say so myself. Can’t believe I wasn’t electrocuted! Ahhh, can’t wait to tell Hornfels and Gossan about this one — I guess brute force isn’t always the answer.

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1Right, so that’s one more off the list. Seems all that’s left is the big one now. Dark Bramble, here I come!
entry.value: Right, so that’s one more off the list. Seems all that’s left is the big one now. Dark Bramble, here I come!

entry.key: SignOuter Wilds Ventures’ founding members. Clockwise from top left: Hornfels, Gossan, Slate, and Feldspar.
entry.value: Outer Wilds Ventures’ founding members. Clockwise from top left: Hornfels, Gossan, Slate, and Feldspar.

entry.key: SignDANGER! Inside this fence is a pocket of <color=orange>ghost matter</color> - a strange and dangerous substance that’s invisible to the naked eyes. The good news is that you can detect <color=orange>ghost matter</color> with a camera.
entry.value: DANGER! Inside this fence is a pocket of <color=orange>ghost matter</color> - a strange and dangerous substance that’s invisible to the naked eyes. The good news is that you can detect <color=orange>ghost matter</color> with a camera.

entry.key: SignMoving through <color=orange>ghost matter</color> is uniquely painful and will probably kill you. Don’t complain to me if you hurt yourself fooling around.\\n- Hornfels
entry.value: Moving through <color=orange>ghost matter</color> is uniquely painful and will probably kill you. Don’t complain to me if you hurt yourself fooling around.\\n- Hornfels

entry.key: Gneiss
entry.value: Gneiss

entry.key: Gneiss1Hello there, space cadet! I hear you’re leaving the crater today.
entry.value: Hello there, space cadet! I hear you’re leaving the crater today.

entry.key: Gneiss1If you meet any of the other travelers up there, remind them to take proper care of their instruments, won’t you?
entry.value: If you meet any of the other travelers up there, remind them to take proper care of their instruments, won’t you?

entry.key: GneissGneiss1Tell me about the travelers’ instruments.
entry.value: Tell me about the travelers’ instruments.

entry.key: GneissGneiss1Where’s the observatory?
entry.value: Where’s the observatory?

entry.key: GneissGneiss1Just saying hi before I leave.
entry.value: Just saying hi before I leave.

entry.key: Gneiss2Take care of yourself up in space!
entry.value: Take care of yourself up in space!

entry.key: ObservatoryIt’s questions like that what make us worried about you going up into space on your own, you know.
entry.value: It’s questions like that what make us worried about you going up into space on your own, you know.

entry.key: ObservatoryThe observatory is up the path behind the waterfall. There are a couple of signs marking the way, but really, you just keep going up and then hook a right when you get to the zero-g cave.
entry.value: The observatory is up the path behind the waterfall. There are a couple of signs marking the way, but really, you just keep going up and then hook a right when you get to the zero-g cave.

entry.key: Gneiss3Oh, sure! I made all of their instruments, you know. Let me see... There’s Chert’s drums, Riebeck’s banjo, and Gabbro’s flute.
entry.value: Oh, sure! I made all of their instruments, you know. Let me see... There’s Chert’s drums, Riebeck’s banjo, and Gabbro’s flute.

entry.key: Gneiss3And Feldspar’s harmonica, of course, though Feldspar’s been missing for a long time. Sometimes it feels like just yesterday they were playing their harmonica around the campfire...
entry.value: And Feldspar’s harmonica, of course, though Feldspar’s been missing for a long time. Sometimes it feels like just yesterday they were playing their harmonica around the campfire...

entry.key: Gneiss3Anyway, you hear music in space, that’ll be one of the space program’s other travelers. If you feel like company, you can always pull out your signalscope and track them down.
entry.value: Anyway, you hear music in space, that’ll be one of the space program’s other travelers. If you feel like company, you can always pull out your signalscope and track them down.

entry.key: GneissSecondaryTrouble is, every time a Hearthian leaves for outer space, that’s one less musician in our orchestra.
entry.value: Trouble is, every time a Hearthian leaves for outer space, that’s one less musician in our orchestra.

entry.key: GneissSecondarySo! Did you need something?
entry.value: So! Did you need something?

entry.key: GneissGneissSecondaryTell me about the travelers’ instruments.
entry.value: Tell me about the travelers’ instruments.

entry.key: GneissGneissSecondaryWhere’s the observatory?
entry.value: Where’s the observatory?

entry.key: GneissGneissSecondaryNah, I’m good.
entry.value: Nah, I’m good.

entry.key: SpaceEverything okay? Seems kind of early for you to be back from space.
entry.value: Everything okay? Seems kind of early for you to be back from space.

entry.key: SpaceDid you need something from me?
entry.value: Did you need something from me?

entry.key: GneissSpaceTell me about the travelers’ instruments.
entry.value: Tell me about the travelers’ instruments.

entry.key: GneissSpaceI’m good, actually.
entry.value: I’m good, actually.

entry.key: Gneiss4Alright. Take care, now.
entry.value: Alright. Take care, now.

entry.key: Gossan
entry.value: Gossan

entry.key: Coach1Hey, I thought I might see you before the big launch.
entry.value: Hey, I thought I might see you before the big launch.

entry.key: Coach1Nerves getting the better of you?
entry.value: Nerves getting the better of you?

entry.key: GossanCoach1Right, like you weren’t nervous for your first flight.
entry.value: Right, like you weren’t nervous for your first flight.

entry.key: GossanCoach1I’m a little nervous, yeah.
entry.value: I’m a little nervous, yeah.

entry.key: GossanCoach1Are you kidding? I’m a natural at this!
entry.value: Are you kidding? I’m a natural at this!

entry.key: Coach2Hey, don’t worry about it. Your nerves are between you, me, and the vast endlessness of space.
entry.value: Hey, don’t worry about it. Your nerves are between you, me, and the vast endlessness of space.

entry.key: Coach2But really, you’ll do fine out there. I’d worry more about that ship, if I were you. Hopefully that lunatic Slate at least fixed the retro rockets.
entry.value: But really, you’ll do fine out there. I’d worry more about that ship, if I were you. Hopefully that lunatic Slate at least fixed the retro rockets.

entry.key: Coach3Good. Everyone should be a bit nervous going into space. I got cocky during my first flight and nearly put a new crater in the moon.
entry.value: Good. Everyone should be a bit nervous going into space. I got cocky during my first flight and nearly put a new crater in the moon.

entry.key: Coach3Still, I was never as green as you.
entry.value: Still, I was never as green as you.

entry.key: GossanCoach3Hey, I’ve gotten better!
entry.value: Hey, I’ve gotten better!

entry.key: GossanCoach3That’s not what Slate says...
entry.value: That’s not what Slate says...

entry.key: Coach4Is that so? Funny, I seem to recall the first time you strapped on a jetpack, we had to come fish you out of the crater near the south pole.
entry.value: Is that so? Funny, I seem to recall the first time you strapped on a jetpack, we had to come fish you out of the crater near the south pole.

entry.key: Coach5Oi, you know better than to believe a word that lunatic says about me.
entry.value: Oi, you know better than to believe a word that lunatic says about me.

entry.key: Coach5They’re still sore I made them install a safety harness in the cockpit. Claimed it would “throw off the thrust-to-weight ratio.”
entry.value: They’re still sore I made them install a safety harness in the cockpit. Claimed it would "throw off the thrust-to-weight ratio."

entry.key: Coach5Honestly. One of these days I’m gonna throw off Slate’s thrust-to-weight ratio.
entry.value: Honestly. One of these days I’m gonna throw off Slate’s thrust-to-weight ratio.

entry.key: Coach6Think so, do you? Feel like proving it to your old flight coach?
entry.value: Think so, do you? Feel like proving it to your old flight coach?

entry.key: Coach7There’s a “satellite” — which is definitely not just a piece of broken mining equipment — set up down in the zero-g cave and in need of repairs.
entry.value: There’s a "satellite" — which is definitely not just a piece of broken mining equipment — set up down in the zero-g cave and in need of repairs.

entry.key: Coach7If you’re looking for a little last-minute zero-g practice, head down the lift and into the cave. Or don’t, so long as you’re confident you can make ship repairs in space.
entry.value: If you’re looking for a little last-minute zero-g practice, head down the lift and into the cave. Or don’t, so long as you’re confident you can make ship repairs in space.

entry.key: GossanCoach7One repaired “satellite,” coming up!
entry.value: One repaired "satellite," coming up!

entry.key: GossanCoach7Nah, I’m ready for the real deal.
entry.value: Nah, I’m ready for the real deal.

entry.key: Coach8So listen, there’s a “satellite” — which is definitely not just a piece of broken mining equipment — set up down in the zero-g cave and in need of repairs.
entry.value: So listen, there’s a "satellite" — which is definitely not just a piece of broken mining equipment — set up down in the zero-g cave and in need of repairs.

entry.key: Coach8If you’re looking for a little last-minute zero-g practice, head down the lift and into the cave. Or don’t, so long as you’re confident you can make ship repairs in space.
entry.value: If you’re looking for a little last-minute zero-g practice, head down the lift and into the cave. Or don’t, so long as you’re confident you can make ship repairs in space.

entry.key: GossanCoach8One repaired “satellite”, coming up!
entry.value: One repaired "satellite," coming up!

entry.key: GossanCoach8Nah, I’m ready for the real deal.
entry.value: Nah, I’m ready for the real deal.

entry.key: Coach9Cool. Get to it, and try not to concuss yourself right before your first launch.
entry.value: Cool. Get to it, and try not to concuss yourself right before your first launch.

entry.key: Coach10Heh. Darn right you are.
entry.value: Heh. Darn right you are.

entry.key: Coach10Don’t get yourself killed out there, you hear? Not after I’ve put this much work into training you.
entry.value: Don’t get yourself killed out there, you hear? Not after I’ve put this much work into training you.

entry.key: Coach10...Haha, go on, go make Outer Wilds Ventures proud.
entry.value: ...Haha, go on, go make Outer Wilds Ventures proud.

entry.key: Coach11If you changed your mind about practicing ship repairs, head down the lift and into the zero-g cave.
entry.value: If you changed your mind about practicing ship repairs, head down the lift and into the zero-g cave.

entry.key: Coach11You just need to maneuver over to the “satellite” and repair each damaged area, same as you’ll be doing for your ship.
entry.value: You just need to maneuver over to the "satellite" and repair each damaged area, same as you’ll be doing for your ship.

entry.key: Coach12What’s the holdup? That “satellite” isn’t going to repair itself.
entry.value: What’s the holdup? That "satellite" isn’t going to repair itself.

entry.key: Coach12You just need to maneuver over to the “satellite” and repair each damaged area, same as you’ll be doing for your ship.
entry.value: You just need to maneuver over to the "satellite" and repair each damaged area, same as you’ll be doing for your ship.

entry.key: PostZeroGNicely done! Of course, it’ll be a little more stressful when you’re hurtling through space, but just remember your training and try not to hit anything big.
entry.value: Nicely done! Of course, it’ll be a little more stressful when you’re hurtling through space, but just remember your training and try not to hit anything big.

entry.key: PostZeroGI can see you’re itching to get off this rock, so go get the <color=orange>launch codes from the observatory</color> and get out of here already.
entry.value: I can see you’re itching to get off this rock, so go get the <color=orange>launch codes from the observatory</color> and get out of here already.

entry.key: PostZeroGBest of luck out there! And hey, try to avoid getting yourself killed now that I’ve put so much time into training you, got it?
entry.value: Best of luck out there! And hey, try to avoid getting yourself killed now that I’ve put so much time into training you, got it?

entry.key: CoachSpaceYou’re back awfully soon. Everything alright? Slate didn’t do anything dumb like install a self-destruct button, did they?
entry.value: You’re back awfully soon. Everything alright? Slate didn’t do anything dumb like install a self-destruct button, did they?

entry.key: NoSuitOi, don’t forget to put on a suit! I don’t want to have to come fish you out of there again.
entry.value: Oi, don’t forget to put on a suit! I don’t want to have to come fish you out of there again.

entry.key: SignHey! Come say hi to your old flight coach before your launch. I’ve got zero-g training set up if you want a refresher.\\n\\n-Gossan
entry.value: Hey! Come say hi to your old flight coach before your launch. I’ve got zero-g training set up if you want a refresher.\\n\\n-Gossan

entry.key: Friend1Hey, hey! So did you get a good look at that Nomai statue?
entry.value: Hey, hey! So did you get a good look at that Nomai statue?

entry.key: HalFriend1The statue looked at me and opened its eyes!
entry.value: The statue looked at me and opened its eyes!

entry.key: HalFriend1The statue was glowing! Why was it glowing?!
entry.value: The statue was glowing! Why was it glowing?!

entry.key: Friend3Whoa, whoa — the statue was doing what?
entry.value: Whoa, whoa — the statue was doing what?

entry.key: Friend3So its eyes opened, and then you saw images from your own memories and glowing lights flying around? You mean like <Pause/> a hallucination?
entry.value: So its eyes opened, and then you saw images from your own memories and glowing lights flying around? You mean like <Pause/> a hallucination?

entry.key: Friend3Listen, no offense, but... are you sure you’re okay to launch? Like, medically speaking?
entry.value: Listen, no offense, but... are you sure you’re okay to launch? Like, medically speaking?

entry.key: HalFriend3You know what, don’t worry about it.
entry.value: You know what, don’t worry about it.

entry.key: HalFriend3No, that statue is definitely weird.
entry.value: No, that statue is definitely weird.

entry.key: Friend4Maybe you should sit down for a bit and take it easy. I’d hate for anything bad to happen if you tried to launch while you’re not feeling great.
entry.value: Maybe you should sit down for a bit and take it easy. I’d hate for anything bad to happen if you tried to launch while you’re not feeling great.

entry.key: Friend4But hey, when you are ready, then you can make the most of our translator tool! Sniff... I can’t believe it’s all grown up and leaving for space already.
entry.value: But hey, when you are ready, then you can make the most of our translator tool! Sniff... I can’t believe it’s all grown up and leaving for space already.

entry.key: Friend4For real, though, I’m glad you’re the one carrying it and not, like, Riebeck. They’d fall on it for sure.
entry.value: For real, though, I’m glad you’re the one carrying it and not, like, Riebeck. They’d fall on it for sure.

entry.key: Friend4Say, if you want to do a short trip to just get your space legs under you, you could check out the ruins on the Attlerock! I’d love to learn what those are.
entry.value: Say, if you want to do a short trip to just get your space legs under you, you could check out the ruins on the Attlerock! I’d love to learn what those are.

entry.key: Friend5I mean, if you’re saying it happened, then... I guess maybe it did. But why?
entry.value: I mean, if you’re saying it happened, then... I guess maybe it did. But why?

entry.key: Friend5Hornfels tried everything to get the statue’s eyes to open, and nothing like this ever happened to them.
entry.value: Hornfels tried everything to get the statue’s eyes to open, and nothing like this ever happened to them.

entry.key: Friend5I don’t think you’re going to get any answers from the museum statue, but Gabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep. Dunno which island they’re on, though.
entry.value: I don’t think you’re going to get any answers from the museum statue, but Gabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep. Dunno which island they’re on, though.

entry.key: Friend5Maybe they’d be able to tell you more? On the other hand, Gabbro’s, y’know, Gabbro, so maybe you’d be better off searching for more info on your own.
entry.value: Maybe they’d be able to tell you more? On the other hand, Gabbro’s, y’know, Gabbro, so maybe you’d be better off searching for more info on your own.

entry.key: Friend5...Geez, now I’m really jealous you’re going into space! Hey, see if you can use our translator tool to find out more about the statue, okay?
entry.value: ...Geez, now I’m really jealous you’re going into space! Hey, see if you can use our translator tool to find out more about the statue, okay?

entry.key: Friend6Good luck, and safe flying!
entry.value: Good luck, and safe flying!

entry.key: PostConvo1Hey again!
entry.value: Hey again!

entry.key: PostConvoMenuWas there something else?
entry.value: Was there something else?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWhere on Giant’s Deep would I find Gabbro?
entry.value: Where on Giant’s Deep would I find Gabbro?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWhere’s the Nomai statue in the museum from?
entry.value: Where’s the Nomai statue in the museum from?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWhy did the Nomai make that statue?
entry.value: Why did the Nomai make that statue?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWonder if I’ll discover anything cool in space.
entry.value: Wonder if I’ll discover anything cool in space.

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuSee you later.
entry.value: See you later.

entry.key: WheresGabbro_OutsideGabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep to wherever they found that Nomai statue. One of the islands, I think.
entry.value: Gabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep to wherever they found that Nomai statue. One of the islands, I think.

entry.key: WheresGabbro_OutsideYou remember Gabbro plays a flute, right? Like, all the time? I bet your signalscope could find them easily.
entry.value: You remember Gabbro plays a flute, right? Like, all the time? I bet your signalscope could find them easily.

entry.key: WheresGabbro_OutsideIf you do see Gabbro, say hi for me!
entry.value: If you do see Gabbro, say hi for me!

entry.key: PostConvo2From Giant’s Deep! Gabbro fished it out of the oceans and brought it back here for study.
entry.value: From Giant’s Deep! Gabbro fished it out of the oceans and brought it back here for study.

entry.key: PostConvo2Hornfels doesn’t know much about it yet, just that it’s crazy old and super tough. I wonder why the Nomai carved it?
entry.value: Hornfels doesn’t know much about it yet, just that it’s crazy old and super tough. I wonder why the Nomai carved it?

entry.key: PostConvo2Apparently, Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the statue. Maybe they’ll find some answers there.
entry.value: Apparently, Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the statue. Maybe they’ll find some answers there.

entry.key: PostConvo3Good question! You know how Gabbro knocked a fragment off the statue while they were hauling it back from Giant's Deep?
entry.value: Good question! You know how Gabbro knocked a fragment off the statue while they were hauling it back from Giant's Deep?

entry.key: PostConvo3Hornfels analyzed the fragment and figured out the stone it's made from can store information — I heard Slate ended up repurposing it for your ship’s computer.
entry.value: Hornfels analyzed the fragment and figured out the stone it's made from can store information — I heard Slate ended up repurposing it for your ship’s computer.

entry.key: PostConvo3I’m not sure what the statue opening its eyes has to do with anything, but maybe the statue was made for storing information, too?
entry.value: I’m not sure what the statue opening its eyes has to do with anything, but maybe the statue was made for storing information, too?

entry.key: PostConvo4Hey, you never know — maybe you’ll be the one to uncover the Nomai’s mysteries!
entry.value: Hey, you never know — maybe you’ll be the one to uncover the Nomai’s mysteries!

entry.key: PostConvo4Or maybe you’ll discover a new kind of rock or something.
entry.value: Or maybe you’ll discover a new kind of rock or something.

entry.key: PostConvo4But honestly, as long as they don’t end up naming new safety equipment after you, I’m sure you’ll have done a great job.
entry.value: But honestly, as long as they don’t end up naming new safety equipment after you, I’m sure you’ll have done a great job.

entry.key: PostConvoEndBe careful out there in space!
entry.value: Be careful out there in space!

entry.key: Marl
entry.value: Marl

entry.key: Marl1So it’s launch day, huh? Hal’s going to miss you.
entry.value: So it’s launch day, huh? Hal’s going to miss you.

entry.key: Marl1Speaking of launch day... I was thinking about it, and the platform those ships launch from is getting old. Isn’t it about time you built a new, less flammable one?
entry.value: Speaking of launch day... I was thinking about it, and the platform those ships launch from is getting old. Isn’t it about time you built a new, less flammable one?

entry.key: Marl1That big tree in the village would be the perfect choice. I wouldn’t mind helping out the space program. Just say the word!
entry.value: That big tree in the village would be the perfect choice. I wouldn’t mind helping out the space program. Just say the word!

entry.key: MarlMarl1The current launch pad is fine, thanks.
entry.value: The current launch pad is fine, thanks.

entry.key: MarlMarl1Nice try. We all know you have it out for that tree.
entry.value: Nice try. We all know you have it out for that tree.

entry.key: MarlMarl1The launch pad is FLAMMABLE?!
entry.value: The launch pad is FLAMMABLE?!

entry.key: FineOh. Really? Dang.
entry.value: Oh. Really? Dang.

entry.key: FineWell, maybe someone needs a new porch or something. <Pause/>A big one.
entry.value: Well, maybe someone needs a new porch or something. <Pause />A big one.

entry.key: OutWhat? No, I just think it’s in the way and someone ought to chop it down, you know? Specifically, me.
entry.value: What? No, I just think it’s in the way and someone ought to chop it down, you know? Specifically, me.

entry.key: Out...Haha, you think this has to do with the time I fell out of it and broke my arm? That was when we were hatchlings! Who would hold a grudge for that long?
entry.value: ...Haha, you think this has to do with the time I fell out of it and broke my arm? That was when we were hatchlings! Who would hold a grudge for that long?

entry.key: FlammableHa! You didn’t realize that?
entry.value: Ha! You didn’t realize that?

entry.key: FlammableDon’t worry, it’s held up for all the launches so far. It’ll definitely be fine for yours. Probably.
entry.value: Don’t worry, it’s held up for all the launches so far. It’ll definitely be fine for yours. Probably.

entry.key: Esker1If you swing by the moon, say hi to Esker for me.
entry.value: If you swing by the moon, say hi to Esker for me.

entry.key: Tree...That tree has got it coming.
entry.value: ...That tree has got it coming.

entry.key: SpaceWhat are you doing back? Did you forget your spacesuit or something?
entry.value: What are you doing back? Did you forget your spacesuit or something?

entry.key: Porphy
entry.value: Porphy

entry.key: SapWineMaker1Heyo, hatchling!
entry.value: Heyo, hatchling!

entry.key: SapWineMaker1I hear you’re leaving us to seek adventure amongst the stars. When you return, let’s you, me, and Gossan open up a bottle of the Good Stuff.
entry.value: I hear you’re leaving us to seek adventure amongst the stars. When you return, let’s you, me, and Gossan open up a bottle of the Good Stuff.

entry.key: PorphySapWineMaker1I’m only seeking adventure amongst one star, actually. Other stars are too far away.
entry.value: I’m only seeking adventure amongst one star, actually. Other stars are too far away.

entry.key: PorphySapWineMaker1The Good Stuff is less “delicious sap wine” and more “daunting digestive challenge.”
entry.value: The Good Stuff is less "delicious sap wine" and more "daunting digestive challenge."

entry.key: SolarSystemAnother metaphor ruined in the name of scientific accuracy.
entry.value: Another metaphor ruined in the name of scientific accuracy.

entry.key: SolarSystemNevertheless, I do hope you enjoy your travels. Good luck!
entry.value: Nevertheless, I do hope you enjoy your travels. Good luck!

entry.key: GoodStuffAn iron stomach is the mark of a true Hearthian, my friend.
entry.value: An iron stomach is the mark of a true Hearthian, my friend.

entry.key: GoodStuffOur hardy hunter-gatherer lifestyle stems from trial and error. By which I mean our ancestors survived eating a lot of bad things.
entry.value: Our hardy hunter-gatherer lifestyle stems from trial and error. By which I mean our ancestors survived eating a lot of bad things.

entry.key: SapWineMaker2Ho, the astronaut returns!
entry.value: Ho, the astronaut returns!

entry.key: PorphyMenuTell me, what I can do for you?
entry.value: Tell me, what I can do for you?

entry.key: PorphyPorphyMenuAny new dirt?
entry.value: Any new dirt?

entry.key: PorphyPorphyMenuWhat are you up to?
entry.value: What are you up to?

entry.key: PorphyPorphyMenuI’m good, actually.
entry.value: I’m good, actually.

entry.key: NewDirtI’m hoping to teach Esker to tap trees next time they return from the Attlerock. If they’ll bring me lunar sap, I can attempt moon wine!
entry.value: I’m hoping to teach Esker to tap trees next time they return from the Attlerock. If they’ll bring me lunar sap, I can attempt moon wine!

entry.key: WhatsUpI’ve just finished sealing up another batch of sap wine for aging. I like to begin aging a batch on the day of a significant occasion, you know!
entry.value: I’ve just finished sealing up another batch of sap wine for aging. I like to begin aging a batch on the day of a significant occasion, you know!

entry.key: WhatsUpThat’s why there are so many bottles labeled “structural collapse” and “house fire.”
entry.value: That’s why there are so many bottles labeled "structural collapse" and "house fire."

entry.key: GoodbyeEnjoy your travels!
entry.value: Enjoy your travels!

entry.key: SapWineMaker3Oh my, and here I thought I’d heard your ship take off. Was your adventure only a short one?
entry.value: Oh my, and here I thought I’d heard your ship take off. Was your adventure only a short one?

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingOkay, wow. Wow. I’ve seen this ruin in other travelers’ pictures, but seeing it for myself...
entry.value: Okay, wow. Wow. I’ve seen this ruin in other travelers’ pictures, but seeing it for myself...

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingIt’s really old, isn’t it?
entry.value: It’s really old, isn’t it?

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingBut wow, this is the coolest day of my life. ...Okay, um, time for some official notes!
entry.value: But wow, this is the coolest day of my life. ...Okay, um, time for some official notes!

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingSo this is some kind of Nomai “locator.” It can point out the different planets - which is incredibly cool, by the way - but from what little I can understand of the writing here, I think it was built to try to find something specific?
entry.value: So this is some kind of Nomai "locator." It can point out the different planets - which is incredibly cool, by the way - but from what little I can understand of the writing here, I think it was built to try to find something specific?

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingI’m not sure. I also was able to translate something about the south pole of Brittle Hollow, so I’ll fly there to see if I can learn more.
entry.value: I’m not sure. I also was able to translate something about the south pole of Brittle Hollow, so I’ll fly there to see if I can learn more.

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingYep. Just gonna get back in the ol’ ship and take off. Totally safe... Mostly safe. <size=20>Oh, stars above</size>...
entry.value: Yep. Just gonna get back in the ol’ ship and take off. Totally safe... Mostly safe. <size=20>Oh, stars above</size>...

entry.key: RiebecksJournalThe journey here from the south pole has been, um... I’m going to go with “harrowing”, because of the, um, all of the meteors. But hey, at least I made it here unconcussed and not on fire!
entry.value: The journey here from the south pole has been, um... I’m going to go with "harrowing," because of the, um, all of the meteors. But hey, at least I made it here unconcussed and not on fire!

entry.key: RiebecksJournalOkay, let’s see... I poked around a little, and there’s some sort of old Nomai path that starts across from my campsite, inside the ruined building with trees growing out of it.
entry.value: Okay, let’s see... I poked around a little, and there’s some sort of old Nomai path that starts across from my campsite, inside the ruined building with trees growing out of it.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalDoesn’t look like anything horrible - just stairs leading down. I can handle stairs! After I get my supplies together, I’ll follow the path and see where it leads.
entry.value: Doesn’t look like anything horrible - just stairs leading down. I can handle stairs! After I get my supplies together, I’ll follow the path and see where it leads.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalHurgh. Well. That was... deeply unpleasant. I made it this far, though. Guess that’s the part to focus on, and not how I’ll eventually have to get back up that path.
entry.value: Hurgh. Well. That was... deeply unpleasant. I made it this far, though. Guess that’s the part to focus on, and not how I’ll eventually have to get back up that path.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalBut wow, this place sure is something! Looks like the Hanging City is north from here. And east is a gravity cannon! I definitely want to see that.
entry.value: But wow, this place sure is something! Looks like the Hanging City is north from here. And east is a gravity cannon! I definitely want to see that.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalAnd another thing - I’m detecting oxygen from somewhere below. Which is good, since I, uh, used up a lot of my supply screaming during the trip down from the surface.
entry.value: And another thing - I’m detecting oxygen from somewhere below. Which is good, since I, uh, used up a lot of my supply screaming during the trip down from the surface.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalAs soon as I stop dry heaving, I’m going to head farther down below so I can refill my tank.
entry.value: As soon as I stop dry heaving, I’m going to head farther down below so I can refill my tank.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalAt first I thought this was an old Nomai settlement, but on closer inspection, I don’t think anyone ever lived here. These buildings are atypical for Nomai dwellings.
entry.value: At first I thought this was an old Nomai settlement, but on closer inspection, I don’t think anyone ever lived here. These buildings are atypical for Nomai dwellings.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalMy best guess? This could be where the Nomai made gravity crystals. We know they mined raw from material from below the crust on Brittle Hollow, then refined that material to produce the crystals.
entry.value: My best guess? This could be where the Nomai made gravity crystals. We know they mined raw from material from below the crust on Brittle Hollow, then refined that material to produce the crystals.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalGravity crystals produce a local gravity distortion that affects the area around them, up to a certain radius. They’re very clever! Nomai used them to anchor themselves to surfaces they might want to traverse down.
entry.value: Gravity crystals produce a local gravity distortion that affects the area around them, up to a certain radius. They’re very clever! Nomai used them to anchor themselves to surfaces they might want to traverse down.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalWe Hearthians have borrowed their technology in our ships, where gravity crystals keep astronauts anchored to just one flat plane (thank the stars!).
entry.value: We Hearthians have borrowed their technology in our ships, where gravity crystals keep astronauts anchored to just one flat plane (thank the stars!).

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingI’m here! I did it! I put the ship down safely!
entry.value: I’m here! I did it! I put the ship down safely!

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingUm, in that the ship went down, and I didn’t sustain bodily harm. A few minor repairs, and it’s like the ship never even hit those rocks!
entry.value: Um, in that the ship went down, and I didn’t sustain bodily harm. A few minor repairs, and it’s like the ship never even hit those rocks!

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingOne of my better attempts. Feldspar would barely have laughed at me, I bet.
entry.value: One of my better attempts. Feldspar would barely have laughed at me, I bet.

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingThat’s the good news. The bad news... I, uh, haven’t found a way inside this structure yet. The door is broken, and I know I’m not great at exploring, but I think I would have found a different entrance by now if there were one. P... probably.
entry.value: That’s the good news. The bad news... I, uh, haven’t found a way inside this structure yet. The door is broken, and I know I’m not great at exploring, but I think I would have found a different entrance by now if there were one. P... probably.

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingI can’t get inside from here, but I know there are paths below the surface. I’m going to head north to the ruins on the equator to try to find a way down.
entry.value: I can’t get inside from here, but I know there are paths below the surface. I’m going to head north to the ruins on the equator to try to find a way down.

entry.key: Rutile
entry.value: Rutile

entry.key: Mayor1You’re actually blasting off in that thing, huh?
entry.value: You’re actually blasting off in that thing, huh?

entry.key: RutileMayor1They really don’t explode as often anymore.
entry.value: They really don’t explode as often anymore.

entry.key: RutileMayor1I’m told my odds of survival are statistically quite high.
entry.value: I’m told my odds of survival are statistically quite high.

entry.key: SkepticAnswer1All I know is between the space program and Mica’s model rockets, things seem to burn to the ground around here more than they used to.
entry.value: All I know is between the space program and Mica’s model rockets, things seem to burn to the ground around here more than they used to.

entry.key: SkepticAnswer2Yeah, the space program’s certainly come a long way. I should probably thank you for causing fewer flash fires than your predecessors.
entry.value: Yeah, the space program’s certainly come a long way. I should probably thank you for causing fewer flash fires than your predecessors.

entry.key: SkepticAnswer2By the way, good luck with those retro rockets.
entry.value: By the way, good luck with those retro rockets.

entry.key: Mayor2Hey, what can I do for you?
entry.value: Hey, what can I do for you?

entry.key: RutileMayor2Marl is plotting to cut down that big tree. Again.
entry.value: Marl is plotting to cut down that big tree. Again.

entry.key: RutileMayor2Are you going to watch the launch?
entry.value: Are you going to watch the launch?

entry.key: RutileMayor2Do you really worry that the space program will burn the village down?
entry.value: Do you really worry that the space program will burn the village down?

entry.key: RutileMayor2I’m good.
entry.value: I’m good.

entry.key: Marl<Color=#808080ff>Sigh...</Color> I suppose it’s my duty as mayor to stop them. Again.
entry.value: Sigh... I suppose it’s my duty as mayor to stop them. Again.

entry.key: MarlWhen Marl fell out of that tree and broke their arm, I suspect they might have also hit their head on the way down.
entry.value: When Marl fell out of that tree and broke their arm, I suspect they might have also hit their head on the way down.

entry.key: FiresOnly constantly. You learn to live with it.
entry.value: Only constantly. You learn to live with it.

entry.key: FiresYou also learn to sleep with a bucket of water next to your bed, just in case.
entry.value: You also learn to sleep with a bucket of water next to your bed, just in case.

entry.key: LaunchOf course!
entry.value: Of course!

entry.key: LaunchI’ll be watching from a safe distance, obviously, and mostly to make sure nothing catches fire. But watching nonetheless.
entry.value: I’ll be watching from a safe distance, obviously, and mostly to make sure nothing catches fire. But watching nonetheless.

entry.key: GoodGlad to hear it.
entry.value: Glad to hear it.

entry.key: MayorSpaceYou’re back already? Is everything OK?
entry.value: You’re back already? Is everything OK?

entry.key: SignEast: Nomai Ruins
entry.value: East: Nomai Ruins

entry.key: SignNorth: Youngbark Crater
entry.value: North: Youngbark Crater

entry.key: SignNorthwest: Geyser Mountains
entry.value: Northwest: Geyser Mountains

entry.key: SignSouth: Quantum Grove Crater
entry.value: South: Quantum Grove Crater

entry.key: Spinel
entry.value: Spinel

entry.key: Spinel1Fishing rhyme, fishing rhyme... Singing helps me pass the time.
entry.value: Fishing rhyme, fishing rhyme... Singing helps me pass the time.

entry.key: Spinel1You’re leaving the crater? Guess we’ll all be a little busier without you around to lend a hand.
entry.value: You’re leaving the crater? Guess we’ll all be a little busier without you around to lend a hand.

entry.key: Spinel1That big water planet, Giant’s Deep - that’s where I’d go.
entry.value: That big water planet, Giant’s Deep - that’s where I’d go.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel1Why’s that?
entry.value: Why’s that?

entry.key: SpinelSpinel1I need to find Hornfels.
entry.value: I need to find Hornfels.

entry.key: Spinel2Did you try the observatory? I’ve literally never seen them anywhere else.
entry.value: Did you try the observatory? I’ve literally never seen them anywhere else.

entry.key: Spinel3One time, after the rest of the village had left to sleep and it was just the two of us sitting around the campfire, Gabbro told me about their first trip to Giant’s Deep.
entry.value: One time, after the rest of the village had left to sleep and it was just the two of us sitting around the campfire, Gabbro told me about their first trip to Giant’s Deep.

entry.key: Spinel3They landed their ship easily enough in the waves, but couldn’t see too far down, on account of how murky the water was, I guess. Too dark.
entry.value: They landed their ship easily enough in the waves, but couldn’t see too far down, on account of how murky the water was, I guess. Too dark.

entry.key: Spinel3Gabbro wants to see what lay beneath the surface, so they decided to travel deeper. They traveled down, and down...
entry.value: Gabbro wants to see what lay beneath the surface, so they decided to travel deeper. They traveled down, and down...

entry.key: Spinel3But suddenly, Gabbro couldn’t go any further.
entry.value: But suddenly, Gabbro couldn’t go any further.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel3Tell me more.
entry.value: Tell me more.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel3Yeah, Giant’s Deep has a current you can’t pass through.
entry.value: Yeah, Giant’s Deep has a current you can’t pass through.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel3I underestimated how boring this would be. Goodbye.
entry.value: I underestimated how boring this would be. Goodbye.

entry.key: Spinel6...You always were my least favorite astronaut.
entry.value: ...You always were my least favorite astronaut.

entry.key: Spinel4I will, I was just pausing dramatically.
entry.value: I will, I was just pausing dramatically.

entry.key: Spinel5Sure, okay, but shut up a minute. This is the good part.
entry.value: Sure, okay, but shut up a minute. This is the good part.

entry.key: Spinel7As though exercising a will of its own, the water was refusing to let Gabbro go any deeper. It held Gabbro back. ...Almost as if it were trying to protect them from something.
entry.value: As though exercising a will of its own, the water was refusing to let Gabbro go any deeper. It held Gabbro back. ...Almost as if it were trying to protect them from something.

entry.key: Spinel7And then, in the terrible darkness, Gabbro saw it...!
entry.value: And then, in the terrible darkness, Gabbro saw it...!

entry.key: Spinel7The tentacle of some hideous beast!
entry.value: The tentacle of some hideous beast!

entry.key: SpinelSpinel7AHHH!
entry.value: AHHH!

entry.key: SpinelSpinel7Is that all true?
entry.value: Is that all true?

entry.key: SpinelSpinel7...Was there sap wine involved during Gabbro’s campfire story?
entry.value: ...Was there sap wine involved during Gabbro’s campfire story?

entry.key: Spinel8I mean, that’s what Gabbro said, anyway. Whatever it was, it freaked Gabbro out pretty good.
entry.value: I mean, that’s what Gabbro said, anyway. Whatever it was, it freaked Gabbro out pretty good.

entry.key: Spinel8Everyone wants to hear new stories at the village campfire, you know. Make sure you bring some back with you!
entry.value: Everyone wants to hear new stories at the village campfire, you know. Make sure you bring some back with you!

entry.key: Spinel9Heard it from Gabbro themself! Gabbro can be a little fanciful, sure, but they aren’t a liar. I mean, probably, anyway.
entry.value: Heard it from Gabbro themself! Gabbro can be a little fanciful, sure, but they aren’t a liar. I mean, probably, anyway.

entry.key: Spinel9I guess if you want to know if the story’s entirely true, you can go see Giant’s Deep for yourself!
entry.value: I guess if you want to know if the story’s entirely true, you can go see Giant’s Deep for yourself!

entry.key: Spinel10Come to think of it, don’t you have somewhere you should be exploring that isn’t here?
entry.value: Come to think of it, don’t you have somewhere you should be exploring that isn’t here?

entry.key: Spinel11Fishing song, fishing song... Geez, I think my bait is wrong.
entry.value: Fishing song, fishing song... Geez, I think my bait is wrong.

entry.key: Spinel11What are you up to?
entry.value: What are you up to?

entry.key: SpinelSpinel11I’m looking for Hornfels.
entry.value: I’m looking for Hornfels.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel11Nothing.
entry.value: Nothing.

entry.key: Spinel12Oh, them? I’d bet today’s haul they’re in the observatory.
entry.value: Oh, them? I’d bet today’s haul they’re in the observatory.
